instructions: Mix in glass on the rocks.

instructions: Shake well and use it as a shot

instructions: bang glass on table and immediately take shot

instructions: This drink requires at least 2 people. Drinker sits in a chair, head back, mouth open. Person 2 pours the apple juice, then the vodka in the drinker's mouth (drinker must be VERY careful to keep his/her throat closed). Then person 2 sprays some in whipped cream and tops with a SMALL amount of cinnamon (too much will make drinker sneeze and possible other not-so-fun things). Drinker sits up, swishes all ingredients together and swallows.

instructions: Poor all ingredients into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass.

instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Serve without garnish in a cocktail glass.

instructions: stir until ingredients are mixed well.

Take out to thaw when you will be ready to drink it in 1 to 3 hours. Pour ginger ale in and chip away until it's slushy.

instructions: Fill cup with ice. Add equal parts of all ingredients. Stir. Serve immediately.
name: CA area 151

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, Benedictine, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.
name: Cabaret

instructions: Add 1.5 oz. Absolut Vodka to 10 oz. cocktail glass filled with ice, top off with Coka-Cola.
name: Charlie Coke

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.
name: Charlie Chaplin

instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Charles Cocktail

instructions: Take the pisang ambon in the glas, and then the milk. Then shake it... Enjoy...!
name: Chapman

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Charger

instructions: Stir or shake well.
name: Champibble

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Champs Elysees Cocktail

instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and serve in punch cups.
name: Champagne Punch #1

instructions: Mix and serve.
name: Champagne Martini

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.
name: Chapala

instructions: Mix sugar, brandy and 5 bottles champagne in a punch bowl. Then stir in orange, lemon and lime sliced thin into rounds, pineapple chunks and ice. Stir until well mixed. To complete, garnish with strawberries and pour a final bottle of champagne theatrically over the top.
name: Champagne Punch #2

instructions: Place lump of sugar and bitters in a chilled champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Champagne Cocktail

instructions: Mix Champagne and Mango juice together, add cubed Mango and ice.
name: Champagne & Mango

instructions: All over ice. Colour should be a lovely turquoise.
name: Chameleon

instructions: Add Cointreau, Brandy and Sugar cube aturated with Peychaud bitters to champagne flute. Fill with your favorite champagne. Garnish with an orange twist.
name: Champagne Celebration

instructions: Pour Chambord and vodka into glass. Fill with sprite.
name: Chambrite

instructions: Blend with ice. Serve up or on the rocks.
name: Chambord sour

instructions: Muddle lime in a shaker. Add ice and all other ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain into a glass.
name: Chambord Kamikaze

instructions: Throw all ingredients into a blender, and blend to your hearts delight. After, pour into an iced punch bowl and drink immediately!
ingredientsWithAmount: 1 pint Fruit punch (any type will do)
name: The Chalise

instructions: Take shot of Bailey's. With Bailey's in your mouth take shot of lime juice. Mix rapidly in mouth by shaking head vigorously. Swallow before it congeals totally.
name: Cement Mixer

instructions: Should be shaked over ice. Garnished with a lemon. More pineapple than cranberry juice.
name: Chambord Royale

instructions: Fill shot glass 3/4 full with vodka. Add the grenadine for color. Finally pour in a little Bailey's. The bailey's will sit in the drink and look like a brain, stem and all.
name: Cerebellum

instructions: Combine vodka and rum in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass with ice. Top off with grapefruit soda and stir gently.
name: Centipede

instructions: Layer the drink pouring the Tattoo in first as it is slightly heavier than the scotch.
name: The Celt

instructions: Put the Strawberry Schnapps into a double shot or other small glass (this can all be performed in a single glass), then add the Bailey's. It will lump together (Bailey's, that is) to look like a brain in a red fluid (SS). Finally, add Grenadine until it "oozes" from the brain, and you're set.
name: Cerebral Hemorage

instructions: Fill one shot glass with Bailey's. Fill second shot glass with Lime and 151. To Drink: Pour Bailey's into mouth, do not swallow. Pour Lime and 151 into mouth. Shake head back and fourth, the shot will turn solid.
name: Cement Kicker

instructions: In a cocktail shaker add ingredients and fill with ice. Shake with gusto for half a minute, and pour/strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel, or lime peel if you use fresh lime juice.
name: Celebration

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Celtic Mix Cocktail

instructions: Shake vigorously over ice, pour into cocktail glass and garnish with either lemon or orange peel.
name: Celebration #2

instructions: In a cazuela that is made of clay, put ice, salt, lime, orange, lemon, and grapefruit in cazuela then add granadine, and the tequila, then fill with Squirt, use a straw to stir.
name: Cazuela

instructions: Serve it chilled up.
name: Catfish

instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.
name: Catherine Of Sheridan Square

instructions: Half fill a highball glass with crushed ice. Next pour in 1.5oz. of your favorite brand of Light Rum. Now pour in .5oz. of liqiud pina colada mix, and then fill to the top of the glass with pineapple juice. After stirring ingrediences, pour in .5oz. of grenadine and alow to settle on the bottom of the glass (do not stir after adding grenadine),garnish the glass with an orange wedge, and then serve "Mon"!
name: Cayman Sunset

instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into chilled cocktail or margarita glass.
name: Catalina Margarita

instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes. Add desired amount of Half-and-Half (usually 1 oz. to 3 oz.)
name: Caucasian

instructions: Drink the neck of the bottle of Corona. Fill in with tequila and then add lime wedge. Turn bottle over to mix the ingredients, making sure to keep your thumb on the opening, as not to spill.
name: Cloudy Day

instructions: Shake gin, chartreuse, and vermouth in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist orange peel and drop into cocktail.
name: Cat's Eye

instructions: Pour 151 last and light.
name: Closed Casket

instructions: Fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir and garnish with cranberries.
name: Cloudberry Dream

instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Climax

instructions: Mix all ingredients except whipped cream in a blener untill ice is well chopped. Pour in coffee mug and top with generous portion of whipped cream.
name: Cloud 9

instructions: Shake with ice. Strain in a cooled cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry on a stick.
name: The Classic

instructions: Stir, and add a slice of lemon and a few mint leaves.
name: Classic Pimms

instructions: mix the kahlua, brandy, and irish creme and garnish with whipped creme. chill
name: Cliffhanger

instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shker of ice, shake, then strain into a rocks glass full of ice. Drinker will have to constantly mix the drink in his glass as the Advocaat will settle.
name: Class Act

instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.
name: Classic Old-Fashioned

instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Claridge Cocktail

instructions: The beer is first. The 7-Up is second. The ice is last, but it is only needed if the other ingredients aren't cold.
name: Clara

instructions: Shake Clamato (keep at room temperature). Pour Clamato into Pilsner glass or oversized beer mug. Pour beer generously down the inside of the glass until full. Be careful of foaming head. Add celery salt, tobasco sauce, and/or worchestershire sauce for flavouring.
name: Clam Eye

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.
name: Clamato Cocktail

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: City Slicker

instructions: Stir in glass.
name: Citrus Surprise

instructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!
name: Citrus Coke

instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half filled with ice and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.
name: Citronella Cooler

instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add rum, triple sec, and sour mix. Fill remainder of glass with grapefruit juice. Stir and garnish with orange and lemon wedges.
name: Citrus Smack

instructions: Mix Lemonade and Citron into a Collins glass....shake or stir, add ice, and drink.
name: Citronade

instructions: In a moderlately sized glass (about 8 to 12 oz or so) pour in finely crushed ice, followed by the cinnamon schnapps and vanilla vodka.
name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch

instructions: Mix well in a blender with ice and serve in a highball glass that has been rimmed with jimmies. Garnish with a day-glo orange circus peanut.
name: Circus Peanut Margarita

instructions: Mix over ice and strain
name: Citron my face

instructions: Pour one shot of Goldshlager into glass. Measure 1 cup of apple juice and pour into glass with Goldschlager. Mix and drink!
name: Cinnamon Stick

instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and pour in glass.
name: Cioccolato e cocco

instructions: Shake with ice. Serve with a slice of dried apple.
name: Cinnamon Road

instructions: Pour shot of Goldschlager in a cocktail glass, fill with 1/2 glass of chilled apple cider, add 1 shot of caramel liqeuer. Stir to mix.
name: Cinnamon Caramel Apple

instructions: Layer each ingredient on top of each other. Melon first, then grenadine, then baileys. Use back of tablespoon to layer evenly.
name: Cinn's Stop Light

instructions: Stir.
name: Cinnamon Cream

instructions: Shake well with lots of ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with fresh lime wedge if desired.
name: Cinco de Mayo

instructions: Blend with 2 cups of ice until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge and banana slice.
name: Cina Polada

instructions: Start with a pint glass filled 3/4 with ice. Add the tequila, triple sec, and sweet and sour. The glass should be about 1/2 full. Add the ginger ale, and stir well.
name: Cinco de Rob-o

instructions: Mix Tequila, Melon Liqueur, Sweet and Sour, and Grenadine. Blend with Ice. Serve in glass.
name: Cindy's Cycle

instructions: Mix southern comfort and cranberry juice in a glass. Layer orange juice on the top. Squeeze lime over the top of the drink.
name: Crazy Maker

instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.
name: Crazy Cow

instructions: Pour ice into a deep stem glass and pour in Orange vodka. Fill with grapefruit juice, and add a splash of Sprite or Champagne. Stir gently and then comes the "crazy part". Spin the glass and drizzle a few drops of grenadine into the drink to make a spiral effect. Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.
name: Crazy Janie

instructions: Shake hard and fast, strain over ice.
name: Crase

instructions: Combine all the ingredients together, leaving out the chocolate ice-cream. Leave in fridge until cold. Add in the chocolate ice-cream, blend. Serve.
name: Crapachino

instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain
name: Crap Schnapps

instructions: Add all the ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Then shake,pour into martini glass and add a few cranberries to complete the drink.(Soak the cranberries in vodka first)
name: Crantini

instructions: Add ingredients to shaker with ice, shake, strain, and serve.
name: Cranberry Zamboni

instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.
name: Cranberry Toad

instructions: Mix Vodka, then cranberry juice, then orange juice, then top with grenadine
name: Cranberry Sunrise

instructions: Make strong tea with 8 teabags and 4 cups of boiling water. Add cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, and spices. Stir until the sugar dissolves. Garnish with orange slices. Serve.
name: Cranberry Tea Hot Punch

instructions: Pour ice cold cranberry vodka, add ice (the more the better). Top with orange juice and stir gently.
name: Cranberry Tart

instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.
name: Cranberry Newt

instructions: Wash the cranberries and put them into a nonreactive saucepan with the water, a pinch of salt and if you wish, the orange slices. Cook over medium heat until all the berries burst -- about 10 minutes. Pour the fruit and liquid into a cheesecloth-lined sieve. Strain the juice to the saucepan, add the sugar and boil for two or three minutes. Taste and add more sugar if it is needed. Cool and chill the juice before serving.
name: Cranberry Juice Cocktail

instructions: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved, chill. Then add ginger ale just before serving. Add ice ring to keep punch cold.
name: Cranberry Punch

instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.
name: Cranberry Frog

instructions: Pour over ice and fill with cola. Stir and add honey. Garnish with a slice of lemon.
name: Cranberry Bomber

instructions: Add all ingredients into blender with ice. Blend until smooth.
name: Cranberry Margarita

instructions: Place the chopped cranberries in a 2 liter jar that has a tight-fitting lid. Add the sugar and rum. Adjust the lid securely and place the jar in a cool, dark place. Invert the jar and shake it every day for six weeks. Strain the cordial into bottles and seal with corks.
name: Cranberry Cordial

instructions: Pour all ingredients over cubed or crushed ice stir well and serve!
name: Cranberry Blast

instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
name: Cranberry Apple Martini

instructions: Put three cubes of ice in a glass. Pour in Vodka, Cranberry Juice, and Collins Mix. Stir and enjoy.
name: Cran-Collins

instructions: Combine Rum and Cranberry juice first. Add splash of Sunny D. May drink with crushed ice, if prefered.
name: Cran-Ram

instructions: Place ice cubes in glass. Add cranberry juice, then orange vodka.
name: Cran-Razz

instructions: Put both ingredients in a shaker and shake over ice.
name: Crackhouse

instructions: Fill and stir, they love the name.
name: Cramit

instructions: In a large container, fill half way with ice. Pour in all contents and mix well. You are ready to serve.
name: Crack Juice

instructions: Shake with ice, strain into glass
name: Crack Pipe

instructions: Pour into glass and mix.
name: Cowboy Roy

instructions: Pour rye whiskey over ice, then add cola, southern comfort, and lime.
name: Cowboy's Comet

instructions: Blend in shot glass. Serve.
name: Cowboy Cocksucker

instructions: Add Butterscotch Schanapps and Mountain Dew to ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and serve.
name: Cotton Candy

instructions: Pour grenadine and 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and dry vermouth. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.
name: Country Club Cooler

instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass
name: Cowboy Cocksucker #2

instructions: Mix as a shot.
name: Cough Medicine

instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a shot glass.
name: Cough Syrup

instructions: Pour tequila, Bailey's Irish Creme, and butterscotch schnapps into glass add ice and Half-and-Half. Pour into shaker, shake to mix and pour back into glass. Garnish with a cherry.
name: Cowboy Killer

instructions: Use a spoon when You pour the Tequila into the glass, so it doesn't mix with the Tabasco
name: Desert Water

instructions: Mix with ice.
name: Detroit Red Wing

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: DeRosier

instructions: Pour, and stir gently.
name: Detroit Diesel

instructions: Serve on the rocks. Optional garnish: lemon or lime twist.
name: Desiree

instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup shaved ice in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.
name: Derby Daiquiri

instructions: Blend the Absolut kurant, Oregat and Frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass, add 2 icecubes, fill with the cranberryjuice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. Optional to add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.
name: Dephaekt

instructions: Fill the jar with ice. Pour over the 3 1/2 oz of whiskey (Jim Beam). Then add the Pepsi and Mountain Dew. Mix if desired.
name: Depressed Goalie

instructions: Pour the Vodka, Pernod, Malibu & Tia Maria into a one pint beer glass, add the lemonade and pineapple juice, and top up with coke.
name: Depth Charge

instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Dempsey Cocktail

instructions: This is the punch we serve at our annual Halloween party. We use a big, black, plastic cauldron to mix this punch in. You can use any LARGE vat to concoct this wonderful drink. Add all alcohols first, then add juices. Add the Sprite just before serving. If you want... do as we do, and drop in chunks of dry-ice to create a bubbling, smoking cauldron of pure Halloweeen evil! It's safe to drink, and does not really change the taste all that much! YAHOO! GET DERAILED!
name: Derailer

instructions: Add the Everclear first and then the OJ so the OJ settles on the top. Then shoot it. Repeat.
name: Demon Drop

instructions: Stir with ice. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass.
name: Delta Sunset

instructions: Add Brandy to glass and fill with Lemonade. Add ice if desired. Stir.
name: Deidru

instructions: Mix all ingredients except Sprite. Pour into Highball glass over ice cubes and fill with Sprite. Garnish with red Cherry and Lime wheel.
name: Dell Boy

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Delmonico #2

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, brandy, sweet vermouth, dry vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.
name: Delmonico

instructions: Add gin, cointrean and lemon juice to a shaker filled with ice shake hard (30 seconds) and serve up in a cocktail glass with lemon twist as garnish
name: Delilah

instructions: Mix all drinks in a blender, You can add 8 cubes of ice to chill the drink and give it more of a body. Add the Hot melting butter(or the schapps right before you drink). Makes enough for at least 10 people.
ingredientsWithAmount: 6 oz Jack Daniels (or other premium sourmash Whiskey)
30 shots Jägermeister (Substitute Sambuka if you wish)
name: Deer Killer

instructions: Mix blue curacao with rum and ice. pour it into a glass and add the rest of the ingredients slowly. Granish with a pice of peach, a cherry and a piece of celery.
name: Delicias de la Habana

instructions: Pour in amaretto and rum on the rocks then add 7-up. stir and serve
name: Deep-7

instructions: Put a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add the Jägermeister and Windsor, stir, then fill the glass with the 7-Up and give it a small stir.
name: Deerslayer

instructions: Starting by the gin and the blue curacao and finishing by the soda, mix directly into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a long lemon twist, a cherry and mint leaves.
name: Deep Valley

instructions: Pour first three ingredients. Then pour orange juice until cup is little more than half filled. Then fill the rest of the way with 7-up and stir until well mixed.
name: Death of a Virgin

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Deep, Dark Secret

instructions: Pour in cup and stir.
name: Death Wish

instructions: Pour the Pernod into the champagne flute and top off with the champagne.
name: Death in the afternoon

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Deauville Cocktail

instructions: Mix pineapple juice and molasses well, either shake or blend, stirring won't work. Pour into glass and drop rum on top but do not stir in. Splash on cherry syrup and garnish with a pineapple wedge or pineapple chunks. Serve slightly cooler than room temp, or over ice.
name: Deep South

instructions: Pour Crown in first...Then the Kahlua, and Float the Baileys on top. Then Slam!
name: Duck Fart #2

instructions: Vodka and Blue Curacao are stirred on ice and then topped with champagne. Place a blue cocktail cherry in the bottom of the glass.
name: Deep Blue

instructions: layered- bottom to top Kahlua, Bailey's, Canadian Club
name: Duck Fart

instructions: In a freezingly chilled glass pour in Bacardi 151 and Gin. Now light the drink on fire (Be careful!) After a few seconds of burning the drink, pour in the coke.
name: Death From Above

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Duchess

instructions: Pour Irish Mist and Orange Juice over rocks. Enjoy.
name: Dublin Driver

instructions: Mix irish whiskey, irish cream, and ice cubes. Shake to chill. Serve with or without the ice, it is very good either way.
name: Dublin Doubler

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
name: Dubonnet Fizz

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Dubonnet Cocktail

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of orange and serve.
name: Du Barry Cocktail

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
name: Dry Rob Roy

instructions: Cut a hole in the top of the watermelon and pour all of the vodka in the watermelon. Put the watermelon (hole upwards) in the fridge for one day before eating.
name: Drunk Watermelon

instructions: Thoroughly blend all ingrediants in an electric blender and serve in a frosted glass.
name: The Drunken Elf

instructions: Put everything into a shaker. Toss in ice and shake (shaking is easier than stirring). Pour contents into whatever glassware you have.
name: Drunk-N-ade

instructions: Pour aftershock into milk mix until lite pink. Drink up.
name: Drool

instructions: Mix and shake Irish whiskey, Midori, and Apple Schnapps with ice. Fill whiskey sour glass with ice. Strain mixture over ice in glass. Fill with sweet and sour. Garnish with several free floating Maraschino cherries
name: Drunk on Christmas

instructions: Put ingredients in a blender with 2-3 ice cubes. Blend for aprox. 10 seconds. Serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Decorate with an orange slice and two maraschino cherries.
name: Drum Cocktail

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Droog's Date Cocktail

instructions: Pour Crown Royal into beer mug (or whatever type of glass that is available). Fill with chilled Dr. Pepper or add ice cubes before pouring. Stir gently with fork, spoon, knife, toothbrush or whatever is handy or forget to stir and wait for surprise at bottom.
name: The Drink of Champions

instructions: Rinse glass with Sherry, discard Sherry. Shake gin over ice in separate glass to chill. Fill rinsed glass with ice, pour chilled gin over ice. Garnish with lemon twist (optional).
name: The Drink

instructions: Stir with cracked ice ans strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.
name: The Drink Without a Name

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Dressed Up Like A Dogs Dinner

instructions: Make a zig-zag pattern of chocolate syrup on the inside of the glass while turning the glass. Blend rum, coconut milk and pineapple, with 2 cups of crushed ice, on high for a few seconds, until all large chunks of ice are gone. Pour into glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.
name: Dressed Up Pina Colada

instructions: Shake and strain into highball glass with ice.
name: Dream

instructions: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.
ingredientsWithAmount: 1 Vanilla bean, split in half length wise
name: Drinking Chocolate

instructions: Add Irish Cream to Hot Chocolate to your taste.
name: Dreamy Winter

instructions: Add Amarretto to Hot Chocolate to your taste.
name: Dreamy Winter Night

instructions: In a lowball glass combine the two and stir.
name: Dreamsicle #1

instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps, then orange juice and at last milk. Stir like a mofo until mixed.
name: Dreamsicle #3

instructions: Pour the schnapps into the orange juice and stir.
name: Dreamsicle #4

instructions: Add Irish Cram to the Hot Chocolate and add Amaretto to your taste. Stir.
name: Dreamy Winter Delight

instructions: Shake and Strain contents into a highball glass filled with ice. Tastes just like the popsicle
name: Dreamsicle #2

instructions: Add Kahlua and Irish Cream to Hot Chocolate. Then add Amaretto to your taste. Stir.
name: Dreamy Chocolate Winter

instructions: Mix in a mixing glass with ice cubes and pour into chilled cocktail glass
name: Dreaming in Antalya

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Dream Cocktail

instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.
name: Dragonfly

instructions: Just Dump 'EM All In A Glass & Mix 'Em All Up.
name: The Dragon

instructions: Pour Bailey's and Curacao in a glass, stir. Add Coca-Cola slowly. No ice, serve with a straw. Blue Curacao may be used if you are out of green.
name: Drainpipe

instructions: In a twelve ounce glass, mix all ingredients and serve.
name: Dragon's Blood

instructions: pour in fire water float bacardi 151 rum on top ignite
name: Dragon's Breath

instructions: Poor Dr. Pepper into glass, add Aftershock. Stir once.
name: Dr. Shocker

instructions: Pour Dr. Pepper into glass and add chambord. Stir to mix, and serve chilled.
name: Dr. Raspberry

instructions: Pour Adocaat and orange fruit juice straight into the glass, there will be a little curdling but dont worry. Add the ice cubes into the glass then Sambuca , slide creme de Menthe down the side. A yellow green yellow formation shouls occur, then add lemonade.
name: Dracona

instructions: Mix 1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps and 12 oz. of Dr. Pepper together.
name: Dr. Peppermint

instructions: Pour white sambuca into shot glass as if you were pouring a normal shot only filling 3/4 of the shot glass. Slowly pour a little Jack Daniels on top almost dripping it into glass. This will cause the Jack to slowly fall to the bottom of the glass, giving the appearance of a "Falling Star".
name: Falling star

instructions: Pour beer into beer stein, add coke. In a shot glass mix the three other ingredients. Pour contents of shot glass into beer stein and chug it all down. Tastes just like a Dr. Pepper.
name: Dr. Pepper #4

instructions: Mix the Amaretto & Bacardi in one shot glass. Fill the beer mug 1/2 way with beer. Light the Bacardi & Amaretto with a match or lighter. Drop the flaming shot glass into the beer. It immediately begins to foam up. At this point gulp it down (be careful not to swallow the shot glass!).
name: Dr. Pepper #5

instructions: fill shot glass with amaretto and gin. Drop shot glass into half glass of beer. Then, slam. It tastes just like Dr. Pepper (the soda)!!!!
name: Dr. Pepper #3

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, triple sec, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a coktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.
name: Fancy Bourbon

instructions: Pour the Baccardi into the shot glass. Add the Margarita mix. Top it with lemon juice and shoot it.
name: Falix

instructions: Combine the shots in a 'collins' glass. Fill the rest of the glass 3/4 full with Coke. Add crushed ice.
name: Dr. Pepper #2

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.
name: Fallen Angel

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Fancy Brandy

instructions: Just pour the vodka and the chocolate syrup together in a glass. Shake well. Then add the mixture of crushed ice and strawberries and voila'.
name: Fairytale

instructions: pour vermouth and brandy into glass, add lime and fill with orange juice, and stir. Splash brandy on top, and serve with straw.
name: Fall of Rome

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Fairy Belle Cocktail

instructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.
name: Fahrenheit 5000

instructions: Chill ingredients before hand. Carefully layer the ingredients in order: Rum, Kahlua, Amaretto, Bailey's.
name: F-69

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.
name: Eye-Opener

instructions: Add lime juice, then THE CAPTAIN, then the Coca-Cola. Stir gently so you don't kill the carbonation. Enjoyed most after several weaker drinks.
name: Eye of the Storm

instructions: Build in highball with lots of ice. Fill with Sprite.
name: Eye of Swamp

instructions: Mix all ingredients into glass. Enjoy.
name: Extreme Valentine

instructions: Pour the jigger of Midori first. Then, very gingerly, slowly pour the Irish Cream on top of the Midori. If done properly, the Irish Cream will sit on top of the Midori without mixing. Repeat the procedure with the Stoli over the Irish Cream. This will give you a very attractive three layer drink. Optional - add a teaspoon or so of Bacardi 151 on the top of the drink. Then, light the 151 and let burn for 5-10 seconds. Put out with a napkin. Shoot the drink and enjoy!
name: Extraterrestrial

instructions: Place ice in shaker and add all ingredients. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.
name: Eyes Wide Shut

instructions: Mix all together.
name: Extremely Drunk

instructions: Mix Peach Brandy, Peach Schnapps, and Triple Sec in highball. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.
name: Extra Fuzzy Navel

instructions: pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.
name: Exploding Cherry

instructions: Mix vodka and orange- and pineapplejuice and pour over ice in a glass. Layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.
name: Exotic summernight

instructions: Combine all alchohol in 12 Oz. glass with ice. Add Sour Mix. Splash Cranberry Juice. Enough to form a layer of red at the top of the glass. Top with foam from draft beer tap.
name: The Extinguisher

instructions: Add the lemonade to the Pimms, then the passion fruit juice and finally a dash of ccranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, a slice of lime, cubes of cucumber and apple and a few mint leaves.
name: Exotic Pimms

instructions: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.
name: Executive Sunrise

instructions: Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Add the first three ingredients and stir. Top up with Sprite and garnish with mint leaves, a strawberry, a twist of orange and a straw. Ole Skeiedal, from Norway, took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.
name: Exotic Finn

instructions: Flash blend with ice cubes.
name: Extended Jail Sentence

instructions: Mix well
name: Evil Slider

instructions: Put all ingredients into the shaker. Shake hard and serve in cocktail glass.
name: Exotica

instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker over ice. Shake ans strain.
name: Evil Tongue

instructions: Mix well. Pour over ice.
name: Evil Tea

instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".
name: The Evil Blue Thing

instructions: Pour over ice. Stir and garnish with a lime slice.
name: Evil Princess

instructions: Pour (drink) the first 2 oz. of corona, and add 2 oz. of Absolut Citron. Cap top of bottle and turn upside down for about 5 seconds. Serve with a lime wedge.
name: Evil Corona

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except green olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the green olive and serve.
name: Everybody's Irish Cocktail

instructions: Shake and serve with ice!
name: Etyk

instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sherry, Dubonnet, vermouth, and Grand Marnier. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry.
name: European

instructions: Blend using a high speed blender.
name: The Event Horizon

instructions: Grenadine will sink to the bottom of the glass. The dash should be just enough to give a thin layer. Mix thoroghly. The correct mix will give a drink which is between pink & orange in color, but exactly NOT one or the other.
name: Ethiopian Camel Basher

instructions: Mix all ingrediants together except for the Surge and stir. Fill the rest up with Surge and enjoy.
name: Ethnic Sugar

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Ethel Duffy Cocktail

instructions: you should never drink one of these.
name: Estonian Forest-fire

instructions: Layer Bailey's First ,milk, Creme de Menthe and Cinnamon Schnapps.
name: Eskimo Joe

instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass. It should be somewhat frothy.
name: Espresso Martini

instructions: Using blender, add rum, fruits, ice, juice, yoghurt. make sure the orange is peeled and seeds taken out. Cut seeds out of apple. Now blend for 1 minute and your ready for the eskimo.
name: Eskimo Joe's drink

instructions: No special instruction. Just put some Vodka over Beer.
name: Ersh (Russian)

instructions: Pour Midori and Chambord over ice in a glass and stir. Then partially fill the glass with Sprite. Stir in Vodka and add the Maraschino cherry.
name: Esirnus

instructions: Take 1 part Vodka and shake well with 1 part of Best beer you know.
name: Ersh

instructions: Pour contents in shaker over ice and shake well. Pour into glass. This is a big shooter so you have to use a small rocks glass.
name: Four Horsemen

instructions: Mix all ingredientes in a shaker ( with ice) and shake it !! enjoy....
name: Ershammar Dream

instructions: Mix together in a shot glass and slam it down.
name: Four Fine Friends

instructions: Mix the tequila, vodka, banana liqueur and coconut milk together. Shake it well together with crushed ice, and put it in an glass. Last, pour the creme de menthe into the glass so that it sink to bottom of the glass.
name: Forza FCK

instructions: Pour straight up.
name: Four Horsemen #2

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.
name: Fort Lauderdale

instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in order listed. Stir lightly.
name: Formula 420

instructions: Mix in shot glass, it's that simple. Use more Tabasco for more fire, less for more alcohol.
name: Forest Fire

instructions: Fill glasses with ice. Mix Absolut, Midori, pineapple juice and cranberry juice in a decanter. Pour over ice and serve. Makes Several.
name: Foreplay on the Neutral Ground

instructions: Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.
name: Formula 3

instructions: Fill the glass with Fernet Branca and drop a splash of cream in. You can always use also foamed cream.
name: Football

instructions: Mix both ingredients together in a tumbler with ice. Strain into a shot glass! Enjoy!
name: Foreplay

instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into cocktail glass. Add a piece of edilbe dry ice.
name: Forbidden Smoke

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Fontainebleau Special

instructions: Moisten the rim of the Collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.
name: Forest Funk

instructions: Stir with ice and strain to cocktail glass.
name: Forgive Me

instructions: Mix or shake all ingredients, except Grand Marnier, with cracked ice in a shaker. Pour or strain into large chilled wine glass or snifter. Float Grand Marnier on top.
name: Fontainebleau Sidecar

instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Malibu. Add pineapple juixce. Stir.
name: Fong Juice

instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a teaspoon of sweet sherry and serve.
name: Fog Cutter

instructions: First, add some ice. Then, pour in your Jack Daniels. Finally add Pepsi and slosh around to mix. Enjoy your victory drink.
name: Flying Squadron

instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with ice. Pour gin and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix. Pour to top with tonic water. Mix lightly.
name: Flying Teetsie Fly

instructions: Fill glass with ice: add Galliano, Creme De Menthe and Vodka. Top glass off with orange juice. Enjoy!
name: Flying Tiger

instructions: Serve on ice.
name: Foggy Morning

instructions: Poor liquors into the highball glass, balance with sprite and top with grenadine.
name: Flying Moose

instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour over a single cube of ice in a small glass. Drink like a shot and throw the ice away!
name: Flügel

instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with crushed ice. Pour tequila and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix and lime juice. Fill the rest with orange juice.
name: Flying Squirrel

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Flying Scotchman

instructions: Layer each ingredient starting with Kahlua, then Bailey's and finish with the Banana liqueur. If you have difficulty layering the shooter (shot) use a tea spoon held upside down and poor over slowly.
name: Flying Monkey

instructions: Pour the vodka and amaretto into the cup first. Then, add OJ until the cup is about half full and add cranberry juice until the glass is about 3/4 full. Add ice to fill the cup, then shake the drink vigorously for a few seconds. Enjoy.
name: Flying Masturbator

instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.
name: Flying Dutchman

instructions: Mix both ingredients with ice, strain into cocktail glass or serve over ice.
name: Fluffy Dog

instructions: Pour Midori, rum, and pineapple juice into shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice. Pour in Sprite and stir lightly.
name: Flyin' Hawaiian

instructions: Pour Mountain dew and banana liqueur into a glass, Stir. Slowly add the Blue Curacao so it takes on a type of swirling effect due to the bubbles, this is as fun too look at as it is tasty to drink.
name: Fluxuation Cocktail

instructions: Pour into gass half filled with ice. Stir well.
name: Fluorescent Dream

instructions: 1/4 fill the glass with crushed ice, making sure you glass is cold so the ice does not melt too much. Pour the Creme de Cacao over the ice, followed by the Advocaat. Slowly add the soda, but be careful, it can fizz up over the glass. Stir.

instructions: Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish whith a slice of lime and red cherry.
name: Flower of nippon

instructions: First pour in the pear soda. Then take the Fanta and the juice. Please use a cognac bowl when mixing and drinking the drink. Then attach the cucumber slice to the rim, as you would do with a lemon slice. Blend and serve instantly!!!!
name: Floaty

instructions: Please add in order from light to heavy finishing with coffee. No mixing required.
name: Flori's Hot Tub Heaven

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Florida

instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend 1 minute or until smooth. Serve immediately.

instructions: Mix in blender until ice is crushed into slushy form. Serve while frozen.
name: Florida Rum Runner

instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

instructions: Sayer the tequila over sambuca Add tabasco.

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Fleet Street

instructions: Shake tequila and Sambuca over ice. Strain into shot glass.
name: Flat Tire

instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a gallon pitcher and refrigerate. Serve chilled.
name: Flip Juice

instructions: Mix everything into a glass, add ice and lime on top.
name: Flash Gordon

instructions: Mix all ingredients into glass, top with ice.

instructions: Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice and stir to combine.

instructions: Orange juice last, stir, and enjoy!
name: Fuzzy Navel #2

instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice
name: Fuzzy Melonberry

instructions: Mix all ingredients (except lemon wedge) into shaker. Fill glass with ice and pour until about 1/4 inch remains in glass and squeeze lemon wedge into drink then drop lemon wedge in (for color and flavor).

instructions: Combine Vodka and Schnapps over lots of ice. Stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with fresh slice of peach.

instructions: Shooter. Shake ingredients with ice (in a mixing tin). Strain into a shooter glass.

instructions: Mix all ingredients together and mix vigorously. Pour into glass and enjoy!

instructions: Pour all of it into a shaker with ice, shake and pour.

instructions: Pour Raspberry first, Butterscotch next and Irish cream last. Need not be layered but pour in order given. Top 'O the Mornin' to you!

instructions: Pour all ingredients in a huge bowl or an empty water bottle that holds several gallons. Stir or shake until mixed and serve either on ice or as a shot.

instructions: Mix all ingrediants in a highball glass. Serve overice. Enjoy!
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 parts Sunny delight (or other orange blend juice)

instructions: Just mix it and drink it!
name: Fuzzy Bullet

instructions: Carefully pour the rum or vodka, then other ingredients. Stir.
name: Fuzzy Comfort

instructions: 2 shots of vodka, 2 shots of Peach Schnapps. Fill the rest with Ginger Ale, Lemonade, and OJ to taste
name: Fuzzy Cooter

instructions: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.
name: Fuzzy Ethan

instructions: Mix 1 part rum, 1 part peach schnapps, and 2 parts O. J. and shake. Pour over crushed ice. Also makes a great frozen drink when blended like a frozen daiquiri
name: Fuzzy Buccaneer

instructions: Fill Glass half full with crushed ice Add Midori Then fill glass the rest of the way full with Ginger Ale This should result in a Chartreuse colored drink. Add more Midori to your taste.

instructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients one part each - and add 7-up. Eight shots of each requires a 2L bottle of 7-up.
name: Fuzzy Balls

instructions: Start at top and work your way down.
name: Fuzzy Blue Gobbler

instructions: Mix all parts together in a glass, or pitcher, depending on the amount of people you wish to serve.
name: Fuzzy Banana

instructions: Self explanatory.
name: Fuzzy Astronaut

instructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.
name: Fuzzy Asshole

instructions: Fill cup 2/3rds with Sprite, fill other 1/3 of cup with Peach Schnapps, add ice.
name: FuzzB@ll

instructions: Combine all ingredients into a large strainer/mixer. Add a handful of ice. Shake for a few seconds. Strain into a mason jar....
name: Fuzzy Ass

instructions: Just pour equally in shot glass
name: Fuzznutts

instructions: In a whiskey glass with ice, add equal parts vodka and spiced rum, a splash of sour mix, then top off with orange juice.
name: Fury

instructions: Pour peach nectar and orange juice into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a slice of orange.
name: Fuzzless Navel

instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a Hurricane Glass and garnish with coconut flakes.
name: Funky Monkey

instructions: Mix ingredients and strain over ice.
name: Funky Filly

instructions: Absolute can be varied to taste and alcohol tollerance. Discretion is advised. Also a dash of lime can be added for a slightly different taste.
name: Fuquay Friday Night

instructions: Pour over ice and top off with cranberry juice.
name: Funky Cold Medina

instructions: Pour beer, ginger ale, vodka, light rum, and ameretto in a funnel. Turn the funnel while you drink it.
name: Funnel Cloud #1

instructions: Mix in shot glass. Serve.
name: Funky Chicken

instructions: Tilt snifter and pour amaretto. While still tilting snifter, pour Grand Marnier. Gently "roll" snifter in the tilted position, set upright, and enjoy sipping!
name: Full Moon

instructions: Cut lemons into wedges and mix into large container.
ingredientsWithAmount: 1/2 bottle Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's green label)
name: Fulminator

instructions: Add the three rums and the Midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little Sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It's a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.
name: Full Moon Fever

instructions: Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.
name: Fuka

instructions: Pour the cola into a tumbler. Add the Goldschlager and stir gently. Consume.
name: Golden Coke

instructions: Mix, then pour into shot glass
name: Golden Comfort

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Golden Daze

instructions: add the shots of goldschlager and Peppermint Schnapps, then fill jar with eggnog
name: Golden Blizzard

instructions: Mix the two ingredients in a shot glass.
name: Golden Apple

instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.
name: Golden Cadillac

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.
name: Golden Bronx

instructions: Add all of the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a large chilled champagne flute. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate.
name: Golden Cadillac with White-Walled Tires

instructions: Pour in shot glass,and pray for the best.
name: Golddigger

instructions: Shake and strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.
name: Gold Record

instructions: Fill a short glass with ice. Pour the Cuervo into glass until about half full (more if you like it like I do). Top off with the Orange Juice. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink. Enjoy!
name: Gold Driver

instructions: When you're filling with milk, make sure you leave enough room for the Goldschlager. Pour the Goldschlager over the back of a spoon.
name: The Gold, The Bad, and The Ugly

instructions: Shake and pour into chilled cocktail or martini glass.
name: Gold Coast

instructions: Float Goldschlager on top of Rumple and enjoy!
name: Gold Baron

instructions: Pour equal parts Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur and Peppermint Schnapps. Serve on the rocks.
name: Godiva Polar Bear

instructions: This is essentially a hot eggnog. You beat an egg, add a tablespoon of honey and a jigger of whisky. Pour this into a irish coffe cup and then fill the glass with warm milk and stir until it's well mixed.
name: Gogl-Mogl

instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.
name: Godmother

instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice, shake and pour into chilled cocktail glass.
name: Godiva Chocolate Martini

instructions: Pour Rum, Vodka, Raspberry Liqueur and Lime Juice a strainer glass. Chill with ice and strain into your shot glass. Float 151 Rum on top of shot. Throw down or ignite and throw down. (Igniting the 151 Rum will lower the alcoholic content.)
ingredientsWithAmount: 1/4 shot Raspberry liqueur or Creme de Cassis
name: Godhead

instructions: Pour 1/2 cup Hot Cocoa into a Brandy Snifter. Add 1 shot of Peppermint Schnapps (Rumple Minze). Add 1 shot of Godiva. Stir. Top with Whip Cream.
name: Godiva Peppermint Patty

instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve. (Bourbon may be substituted for scotch, if preferred.)
name: Godfather

instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.
name: Godchild

instructions: Pour Whiskey and Peach Schnapps over ice cubes in a High Ball Glass. Add frozen canned orange banana punch (no water). Add lemon juice and fill the rest with pepsi. Stir well and serve.
name: God's Great Creation

instructions: Add all ingredients and stir.
name: Goats Milk

instructions: Boil sugar and spices in water, leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol, let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.
name: Gluehwein

instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order. Do not mix! Float Blue Curacao on top.
name: Glow-Worm

instructions: Mix all ingredients, except for the lemonslices, in a coffee mug. Heat it (using a lid) on full power for 5-6 minutes or, if you are using a temperature meter, 75'C. Stir, until the sugar is dissolved. Serve in a small cup, with a slice of lemon for decoration.
name: Glogg in the Microwave

instructions: Stir with ice. Strain in a cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry.
name: Gloom Raiser

instructions: Put cardamon seeds, cinnamon, cloves and orange parts in nylon bag and tie top. In large saucepan put bag, half bottle of the wine, and the raisins. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Add remaining wine and the almond, heat through. In another saucepan warm about 1/3 of the brandy (or aquavit), pour in sugar and light with match to flame. When sugar has melted, pour in the remainder of brandy. If necessary extinguish flame with cover lid. Add sugar mixture to wine mixture. Pour in cups with raisins and almonds in each serving. Serve in irish coffee cup. A hot cup of glogg is the Scandinavian way of offering a warm welcome to a friend on a wintery evening.
name: Glogg - Swedish

instructions: Mix everything in a casserole. Keep overnight. Heat the mixture - do NOT boil. Strain and serve hot woth raisins and almonds. (You have to throw the almonds in boiling water for maybe a minute, and peel of the brown 'coating'. They should be white for use with glogg.) Serve in irish coffee cup.
name: Glogg - Grandmother's

instructions: Stir half a bottle of the wine with the spicesand sugar under heating, close to boiling. Remove casserolee from heat. Set aside for 24 hours. Strain off spices, and add remaining wine, vodka, and sherry. Add appx. 10 dashed aromatic tincture (this is a spice concentrate). Bottle your glogg, seal well, and let mature for a week. Mix with red wine or water, heat and serve in irish coffee cup.
name: Glogg - Christmas

instructions: Mix wine and spices, and heat it under cover some minutes on low heat - DO NOT BOIL. Add sugar, lemon peel and stir. Keep on heat and covered for a few more minutes. Serve with raisins and almonds. (You have to throw the almonds in boiling water for maybe a minute, and peel of the brown 'coating'. They should be white for use with glogg.) Serve in irish coffee cup.
name: Glogg - Grandfather's

instructions: Mix it all together on ice, what else?
name: Go Girl!

instructions: Pour the wine & vodka into a large pot. Add spices, fruit and nuts. Turn on the heat and bring the ingredients to a temperature just below the boil. Now for the fun part. Invite all of your guests into the kitchen. Place the sugar cubes in a sieve (one that you don't mind sacrificing to the greater good). Don oven mitts and set the glogg on fire. Ladle the burning glogg over the sugar cubes until it has all melted. I usually do this with the overhead lights off for greater theatrics. When the sugar is melted, cover the pot to extinguish the flame. Ladle glogg, fruit and nuts into irish coffe cups and serve.
name: Glogg #1

instructions: Combine all the non-alcoholic ingredients in a heavy enamel or stainless steel saucepan, bring to a boil and simmer 5 minutes. Add the red wine and the port and bring to a boil again. Remove from heat and let steep, covered, for at least 2 hours. Then bring back to a simmer, add the brandy, and heat for 1 minute. If you want to be fancy you can put it into a warmed metal bowl, turn down the lights and ignite it before serving. Serve in irish coffee cup.
name: Glogg #2

instructions: Fill highball glass(or preferably a 32 oz. glass) halfway with crushed ice. Add alcohol contents over ice. Pour coke over mixture. Mix well.
name: Golden Cola

instructions: Mix in order listed. The blue splash at the end makes the drink aquamarine colored, which is lovely.
name: Glitch

instructions: Of course in Norway most people just buy an extract. Anyway, this makes a pretty nice Glogg: Add cloves, cardamon pods, cinnamon, and citrus peel to a glass with a generous measure of snaps (akvavit) or vodka. Let sit for a day or so. This makes a cery nice extract that can be added to any decent red wine. Just heat up the wine slowly (dont let it boil!!), and add sugar and extract to taste.
name: Glogg Extract

instructions: Shake well till it is a cream color and is frothing.
name: Green Thing

instructions: Add ingredients and ice to mixing tin. Shake 3 to 5 times and strain into shot glass.
name: Green Voodoo

instructions: Mix together first three ingredients and then slice fresh limes and place in drink, then allow to sit for at least one hour. This drink is to be made in a large quantity, so the limes may "take effect."
name: Green Tree Frog

instructions: Take an ordinary glass, and put in the two shots of coconut rum. Malibu or Coco Ribe will work nicely. Then pour in Mountain Dew. Make sure the Dew is chilled, or at least cold, and serve stirred, not shaken or strained. Adjust ingredient quantities to taste.
name: Green Summer

instructions: Mix Chartreuse and Sour Mix on top of ice in Collins glass. Fill with coca-cola and, if you like, garnish with lemon or lime slice.
name: Green Tea

instructions: Shot of 151 first then Creme de Menthe.
name: Green Spider

instructions: Pour the Pisang Ambon into a glass, of the approx. size 1 dl. Slowly pour the OJ into the liquor. No stirring... Enjoy !
name: Green Orange

instructions: Mix Jack Daniels, vodka, blue curacao and ice cubes in cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into glass and top up to desired level with 7-up.
name: Green Scorpion

instructions: Mix two together. Serve over ice.
name: Green Russian

instructions: Mix it all together in the glass.
name: Green Puma

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.
name: Green Sneaker

instructions: Pour into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass.
name: Green Poison

instructions: shake with ice. pour into glass.
name: The Green One

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Green Opal

instructions: In tall glass, mix Midori, lime juice, sweet and sour, and vodka. Top off with tonic water and stir well.
name: Green Quencher

instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass.
name: Green Motherfucker

instructions: Blend quickly and serve.
name: Green Ocean

instructions: This is to be made up in a pint glass. Make up your basic snake bite, add the spirits, stir well, it goes bright green!
name: The Green Monster

instructions: Fill bottom with shot of Pucker and fill with soda.
name: Green Meanie

instructions: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.
name: The Green Mile

instructions: Pour Grenadine on the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredienses in a shaker and shake it well with crushed ice. Finally pour it in the glass.
name: Green Milkshake

instructions: Into an old fashion glass, pour vodka over ice. Add pickled pepper, and stir around with its stem. Devour pepper after draining drink.
name: Green Monster

instructions: Build in an ice filled glass. Serve. Great as a frozen drink.
name: Green Label

instructions: Pour 151 rum, lime juice, and food coloring into a glass with several ice cubes. Shake, and strain into a shot glass.
name: Green Monster #2

instructions: Mix all together in order, shake once and pour into glass.
name: Green Lantern

instructions: shake with ice, strain into rocks glass
name: Green Jolly Rancher

instructions: Mix all ingredients(in any order) in a large tub, which can hold several gallons. Stir so that the Sherbert is completely dissolved. With the exception of the kool-aid and sherbert, as much or little of the other ingredients may be used.
name: Green Monster Party Punch

instructions: Shake with Ice. Fill in 4 glasses. Serve with sugar crusta.
name: Green K

instructions: Mix Tequila, Melon Liquor and Sweet and Sour Mix in Blender. Add ice. Serve in glass.
name: Green Iguana

instructions: Shake all ingredients together and pour over cracked ice
name: Homewrecker

instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.
name: Honey Lemonade

instructions: Let tea steep for at about 5 mins so it's nice and strong. After tea is cool, mix together the remaining ingredients. Add more sugar and/or lemon juice to suit your taste. Some flavors may need more juice concentrate.
name: Homemade Snapple

instructions: Combine the crushed ginger,lime peel,juice and sugar in a jar or bottle larger than 32 oz with a lid that can be tightly sealed. Pour in the boiling water. Cover loosely and let cool to room temp. Dissolve the yeast in the lukewarm water and add. Seal the jar as tightly as possible and let stand at room temp overnight. Chill, strain and serve.
name: Homemade Ginger Beer

instructions: Fill rocks glass with ice, add Amaretto and Baileys and serve with a stirrer.
name: Homecoming

instructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.
name: Homemade Kahlua

instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Grenadine. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.
name: Holy Water

instructions: Peel, pit and slice peaches. Place in saucepan. Add sugar, stir well to combine. Warm over low heat until sugar is well dissolved and peaches are juicy. Place mixture into aging container. Add lemon peels and alcohol, stirring to combine. Cover container and put in a cool, dark place (or refrigerate if necessary). Stand for 1 week, stirring occasionally. Strain and filter: press out liquid from peaches with the back of a wooden spoon. Strain again. Ready for cooking now, ready for drinking in another month.
name: Homemade Southern Comfort

instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for 30 seconds until they are mixed well. Pour into container, cap and refrigerate. Let it age for 1 to 2 weeks to mellow. The color will intensify as it ages, reaching a more traditional light shade of yellow.
name: Homemade Advocaat

instructions: Add ingredients, stir, and serve.
name: Holy Doodle

instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Blue Curacao. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.
name: Holy Blue

instructions: Mix with ice and strain into ice filled highball glass.
name: The Hollywood

instructions: Take a bunch of grape juice and a bunch of fizzy stuff (club soda, ginger ale, lemonlime, whatever). Mix them in a punch bowl. Take orange sherbet and lime sherbet. Scoop out scoops and float them in the punch, let them melt a little so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch but there are still "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops. Looks horrible, tastes just fine.
name: Holloween Punch

instructions: mix all ingrediants in a shaker and then strain.
name: Hollywood

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Hole-In-One

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Hokkaido Cocktail

instructions: Mix champagne and frozen cranberry juice (undeluted). Slice lime and garnish each wine glass. Serve with breakfast to start the day right. Note: Mix right before serving to retain the bubbles. Yo may use non-alcoholic champagne.
name: Holiday Cheer

instructions: place ingredients into shaker with ice. shake and strain into shot glass
name: Hologram

instructions: Add ice and a cherry. Stir.
name: Hispaniola

instructions: Fill your shot glass 3/4 way full with Triple Sec. Then carefully layer the Bailey's on top of the Triple Sec. Finaly add some drops of Grenadine into the center of the shot. If done correctly it will look like an atomic mushroom cloud when the drop his the bottom of the shot glass
name: Hiroshima Bomber

instructions: Use a blender. Fill it with ice. Pour in the ingrediences. And blend it all together. Serve in a hurricane glass with a piece of orange on the glass.
name: Hilde's Special

instructions: Shake all ingredients except coke.Poor over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.

instructions: Heat vine, add raisines and boiled. Mix Coca-Cola, tequila, orange juice and add to boiled vine with raisines. Toss bananas with hot red pepper flakes. Pour Don Perignon over bananas. Mix everything thougether and store in a glass jar. Put in a fridge for 8 hours. Served chilled with fresh cherries. Enjoy !!!
name: Hina Blast

instructions: Shake. Serve in a chilled glass.
name: High Voltage

instructions: Mix the Captain Morgan, Mountain Dew, and sugar in one class. Pour the fire water into a shot glass. Take the shot, then follow it with the mixed drink. Make sure to drink the mixed drink quickly
name: Hillinator

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.
name: Highland Fling Cocktail

instructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and Scotch. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

instructions: fill a medium glass most of the way with ice, pour in 1 shot, about 1.5 ounces of whiskey, fill the rest of the way with ginger ale.
name: Highball

instructions: Shake and strain, pour into collins glass with ice. Garnish with flag.

instructions: Make Cocoa in the traditional method, add Whiskey liberally
name: Hershey Squirts

instructions: Fill hiball glass with 5-7 ounces of cognac. Next, fill remainder of glass with lemon-lime soda. Finally, squeeze 1/2 of medium size lemon and garnish with 1/4 inch lemon wedges.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
name: Hemingway Daiquiri

instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for no longer than 2 mins. Pour over ice and enjoy straight away.

instructions: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly, except for the whipping cream. You can use a mixer (recomended) or by hand. After all the ingredients are mixed well you will add the whipping cream, mix lightly, do not overmix.

instructions: Start with sugar in the empty glass. Next pour in the whiskey, followed by the coffee. Stir till sugar is disolved, let mixture settle. Float whipped cream on top. Curl up in front of the fireplace with J. Joyce and enjoy!

instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until mixed well, serve cold. Stores up to two weeks in the fridge, but it's never lasted that long :-).
name: Irish Cream - Bailey's #3

instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Blend on lowest setting until frothy or well blended.

instructions: Combine whiskey, sugar and coffee in mug and stir to dissolve. Float cold cream gently on top. Do not mix.
name: Irish Coffee

instructions: Put everything in a blender and mix. Makes about three small mason jars.
name: Irish Cream #2

instructions: combine Southern Comfort and Blue Curacao in a high ballglass over ice. Add enough orange juice to fill the glass. The orange juice and blue Curcao will combine to form a lovely green shade!

instructions: Mix cofee and chilled Irish Cream and half & half. Add sugar and stir. Serve hot in an Irish coffee cup.
name: Irish Coffee #2

instructions: Pour Irish Cream and Tequila over ice and stir.
name: Irish Cactus

instructions: Stud the strips of orange and lemon peel with 2 cloves each and place them in a frying pan or chafing dish with the stick of cinnamon and the 2 teaspoons of sugar. Place over moderate heat, stirring occationally with a wooden spoon, until the sugar has melted. Pour the Irish Whiskey into the pan and light a match to the liquid. (Be sure to step back since the flame will flare up instantly.) Shake the pan to and fro slowly until the flame dies out. Pour in the hot coffee all at once and let it come to a simmer. Remove from the heat. Rub the cut edge of a strip of lemon peel around the inside of each the irish coffee cup and dip it into a dish of caster sugar so that the sugar adheres to the inside rim. Pour in the coffee, trying not to disturb the sugar. Top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream.
name: Irish Coffee #3

instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled Martini glass and garnish with a orange twist.
name: Inverted Pyramid Martini

instructions: Mix ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.
name: International Jack

instructions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into Poco grande glass.
name: Insomniac

instructions: Put in all alcohol first and water last, then salt
name: Instant Death

instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Pour in the 1oz. of Peach Schnapps, then add orange juice 3/4 to the top and shake. Slowly add the 1/2oz. of Grenadine (watch it sink to the bottom of the glass). In a mixer, mix the 1/2oz. of Blue Curacao with the 1/2oz. of Vodka then, slowly strain into the cocktail glass (filled with oj and Grenadine). Voila! Your inverted Traffic Light. Note: The drink is consumed in layers and therefore, not stirred.
name: Inverted Traffic Light

instructions: Stir.
name: Invisible Parrot

instructions: Put the tabasco sauce in the bottom of a shot glass, pour equal parts Absolut Peppar and Everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.

instructions: Mix all together and take all at once as a shot.

instructions: pour ingredients over ice in normal glass

instructions: Dissolve jello with 1 cup boiling water, add 1 cup vodka and srir, pour into shot glasses, ice trays, or in 1 oz plastic cups found at party supply stores (they even have little lids for them), chill until firm. Each person can use a knife or their tongue to loosen the edges of the jello and then suck them down. If you use the 1 oz plastic cups and lids you can serve them by placing all of the cups in a large bowl filled with ice...they will stay cold longer, and they look really festive! * Try making an assortment using several flavors of jello!

3 oz Heavy cream or medium cream

Lime juice or lemon-lime juice (to cover eggs)

instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

instructions: Shake after poured, add a cherry and slice of orange
name: Long Island Sunset

instructions: Just mix the ingredients and enjoy it.
name: Long Island

instructions: Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into shaker and give ONE brisk shake. Pour back into glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.
name: Long Island Iced Tea (By a Long Islander)

instructions: In a large blender cup, add ice, sugar cubes, creme de cacao, vanilla extract (optional), and the cream or Half & Half. Mix for no more than 5-10 seconds. Then add the alcoholic beverages in no particular order, then hit the "frappe" or "whip" button on the blender for 15-20 seconds, or until you can see that all the ingredients are well-blended, but before you over-blend and start the ice melting too fast. Serve in a tall pre-chilled Tom Collins or similar tall iced-tea glass. No garnish required, serve with a large-diameter straw.
name: Long Island Milkshake

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
name: May Blossum Fizz

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Maxim

instructions: First, have all the ingridients cold. Mix the liquor in a glass and then add the iced tea, coca-cola and lemon. Be sure to stir or shake. Serve chilled in a big (beer?) glass.
name: Long Island Iced Tea #6

instructions: Add ice to glass. Add Alcohol. Add Sweet and Sour mix. Fill to the top with Cola (preferably Pepsi). Squeeze and add lemon
name: Long Island Iced Tea #5

instructions: Mix all liquors and sweet and sour and top off with Pepsi Cola. Stir and Serve with a Lemon wheel.
name: Long Island Iced Tea #4

instructions: combine ingredients in mug and stir until fizzy
name: Matty's Magic Mixture

instructions: Build on the rocks and stir with a straw.
name: Matt's Tropical Punch

instructions: Chop the Lime, stir in with Cane Sugar and Ginger. Add the Crushed Ice and fill up with Apple Juice. Enjoy!

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

instructions: Chill glass. Shake Stoli Oranj over ice. Glaze glass with Chambord. Pour Stoli and garnish with twist of lime.

instructions: pour soouthern comfort and lime juice over ice, stir, enjoy

instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass of ice. Stir well and serve.

instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec, orange juice, and orange bitters into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice.

instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

instructions: Put water in a saucepan. Add the cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves and bring to a boil. Cover, turn heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the milk and sugar and bring to simmer again. Throw in the tea leaves, cover, and turn off the heat. After 2 minutes, strain the tea into two cups and serve immediately.

instructions: Fill glass with 3 oz of Bailey's Irish Creme, then add 1 oz of Southern Comfort, followed by mixing in 1 oz of Buterscotch Schnapps.

instructions: Chill martini glass. Mix equal parts stoli and Cointreau. Chill and strain. Garnish with orange slice.

instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

instructions: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive, and serve.

instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive, and serve.
name: Martini (Dry) (5-to-1)

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or the olive.
name: Martini #4

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or an olive.
name: Martini #3

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or an olive.
name: Martini #2

instructions: Layer in order.

instructions: Blend strawberries, raspberries and apple juice until it is slushy. Fill each champagne flute half way with fruit mix. Fill the remaining flute with champagne, and stir until champagne and fruit mix are mixed. Top off with whipped cream (optional).

instructions: pour surge then vodka, enjoy!

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass

instructions: Place first 4 ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Freeze in blender container for 1 hour or until slightly frozen. Loosen frozen mixture from the sides of blender container, add yoghurt and blend until smooth. Garnish with banana slices. Serve immediately.

instructions: Pour Chambord and Peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Fill up to half with coconut syrup and fill the other half with orange juice and stir. After a few minutes the juice and syrup separate from the alchohol and it looks like sand but tastes MUCH better. Garnish with paper umbrella through a marachino cherry and orange wedge.

ingredientsWithAmount: Garnish with Whipped cream (or lime slice)

instructions: Chop the orange peel finely and mix it with the herbs and alcohol. Let it stand for 15-20 days in a sealed jar, agitating it every day. Pour off spirits through a cloth, and seal again. Put the strained off seeds and peel in a saucepan, crush it, cover with boiling water and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour into another jar, cover and let stand for 2 days. Strain this off and add it to the spirits. Add caramel coloring, filter again and let it rest until it settles perfectly clear.
name: Orange Bitters

Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

instructions: Remove strings from rhubarb, wash, and cut into 1/2" pieces. Wrap rhubarb in cheesecloth and tie shut. Bring sugar and water to boil. Put cheesecloth in the syrup and simmer over medium heat for 30 minutes or until it thickens. Remove cheesecloth, squeeze it to get the juice out. Pour syrup into a clean, dry bottle and cork tightly. To mix add 1 part syrup to 3 parts water and add 2 ice cubes per person. Serve well chilled.
name: Rhubarb Syrup

instructions: In a tall glass pour a generous shot or two of gin and a roughly equal amount of grapefruit juice add plenty of ice fill with tonic (preferably diet) lime twist is optional
