instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.
name: Reform Cocktail

instructions: Put powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and gin, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.
name: Remsen Cooler

instructions: Pour in vanilla schnapps, layer Irish cream on top.
name: Redhead's Nipple

instructions: Fill a mason jar 1/4 to 1/2 full with Southern Comfort, depending on how strong you want the drink. Fill the jar the rest of the way with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy! Add some ice if you plan on drinking this over a period of time.
name: Redneck

instructions: Fill a blender 1/2 full (or 1/2 empty) with ice. Fill 1/4 of the blender with vodka. Fill 1/2 with pine-orange-banana fruit juice. Fill the rest with fresh strawberries, and about 4 tsp. sugar. Blend, serve with an orange slice.
name: Reggae Ambassador

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Redcoat

instructions: Mix vodka, vermouth, and creme de cassis. Pour over crushed ice, and garnish with a slice of orange.
name: Red Vodkatini

instructions: Mix the icing sugar with the red wine, and stir well. Pour in the soda. Put in some Orange/Lemon slices. Serve immediately with a lot of ice.
name: Red Wine Punch

instructions: Mix it all over ice, strain into shot glass.
name: Red Snapper #2

instructions: Put Pernod in a pint glass. Fill almost to the top with cider and add the blackcurrant. After that, it's up to you.
name: Red Witch

instructions: Build. Top with grenadine. Lime boat garnish.
name: Red Velvet

instructions: Mix it together.
name: Red Square

instructions: Layer. Aftershock, then Goldschlager and peppermint schnapps on top.
name: Red, White and Blue

instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot
name: Red Snapper

instructions: Serve hot. Top with whipped cream, garnish with a tall cinnamon stick
name: Red Rudolph

instructions: This is an extended ordinary Tequila drink with a half lemon slice on the edge of the glass. Add Tabasco sauce to the drink until the colour is strongly reddish. Mix lightly.
name: Red Tequila

instructions: Add pisang and squash (lemon juice) and ice cubes in a mixer and mix it. Then add Sprite and the strawberry syrup.
name: Red Zalo

instructions: mix vodka and o.j. in blender with ice. add champaine and stir in.
name: Russian Brunch

instructions: Pour cold beer into a large glass, and drop whole shot glass full of vodka into beer. Guzzle as fast as you can, and let out a roar, a REAL man.
name: Russian Boilermaker

instructions: Fill shot with vodka then peach schnapps. Add a dash of grenadine (do not stir). Allow grenadine to settle at the bottom of the glass. Shoot.
name: Russian Candy

instructions: Mix all three incrediants with ice, shake, and then strain into a shot glass.
name: Russian Apple

instructions: First add the Aftershock then poor the Rumple Minze ontop and let the good times roll.
name: Rumple Shock

instructions: Pour vodka and kahlua into old-fashioned glass over ice. Stir. Add irish cream and light cream.
name: Russian Cream

instructions: Pour vodka into glass, the carefully add the tomato juice so that it falls to the bottom of the glass. Last, add a couple of drops of tabasco sauce.
name: Russian Bloody Mary

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Russian Cocktail

instructions: Put ice in the glass, pour the SoCo in, fill with Schweppes Russchian and add a splash of lime.
name: Russchian Comfort

instructions: Whisk all ingredients in pitcher. Serve over ice. If frozen Margarita required, substitute ice for water and blend.
name: RumRunner's Easy Margarita

instructions: Fill large glass with ice Add Vodka and Ruby Red juice Top with Tonic Pour from one glass to another to mix
name: RumRunner's RubyRed

instructions: Shaken, not stirred!
name: Rum Snapp

instructions: Mix alcohol over glass of ice. Stir. Add Club soda and stir gently. Serve.
name: RumBubble

instructions: Mix all ingredients, including ice, and pour into glass.
name: Rummple

instructions: Mix it half and half and serve chilled. Enjoy!
name: Rumka

instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of 2 oz. carbonated water and juice of lime in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and stir. Add bitters and rum. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve with a swizzle stick.
name: Rum Swizzle

instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Rum Toddy

instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.
name: Rum Screwdriver

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.
name: Rum Sour

instructions: Soak sugar cube in Angostura bitters. Crush it with a pestle in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes, pour in rum, add a few dashed of Pernod and fill with water.

instructions: Pare 6 oranges very thinlyand put the rinds into a gallon jar. Add the juice of the fruit. Add 1 pint cold water, close the jar, and let the liquid stand for three days, stirring it now and then. train into an enamel dish, add 2 to 3 pounds sugar, and bring to a boil. Add a full pint of orange juice and strain it again. Finally, add about 2 quarts rum and bottle.
name: Rum Shrub

instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.
name: Rum Runner

instructions: Freeze in blender and serve in 12 Oz. glass.
name: Rum Runner #2

instructions: Stir or Shake. Grenadine can be adjusted for your own taste.
name: Rum Punch #3

instructions: Fill blender with one and a half cups of ice, add all the liqours in the blender and mix until the consistentsy has thickend. Pour into glass and add a cherry on top.
name: Rum Runner Island Style

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktial glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or an olive.
name: Rum Martini

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
name: Rum Milk Punch

instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Rum Highball

instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.
name: Rum Punch

instructions: Pour all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Rum Runner by Charles

instructions: 1. Fill mixing glass with ice 2. Add light rum and lime juice and sugar syrup 3. Shake 4. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice 5. Fill with club soda. 6. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.
name: Rum Old-fashioned

instructions: Dissolve honey in warm water. Put liquid honey, lemon juice and rum together in tall jug. Add mint leaves and leave to stand while brewing tea. Pour boiling water in a jug and steeped tea bag for 5 minutes. Remove tea bag and chill tea. Pour chilled tea and dry ginger ale into rum mixture. Stir well. To serve: pour over one ice cube in each glass.
ingredientsWithAmount: 5 tblsp Mint leaves, roughly chopped or torn
name: Rum Punch #2

instructions: Mix together and serve over ice
name: Screaming Purple Jesus

instructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

instructions: Stir together and serve over ice
name: Screaming Orgasm II

instructions: add orange juice first, then add vodka, and finally add apple juice and stir lightly. The pooring should do most of the stirring.
name: Screwdriver (modified)

instructions: Mix with ice.
name: Screwdriver Boricua

instructions: Start with a shot or two (depending on your preference) of vodka in the glass. Add organge juice until its almost full. Then add a shot or two of Kahlua , just until its has a bit of color. Then some ice, and stirr
name: Screwdriver with Color

instructions: Stir liquids with ice then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with celery and cucumber. Serve immediately.
name: Screaming Viking

instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes, add all ingredients, mix then drink!
name: Screw-Up

instructions: fill up the shaker with ice and put the ingredience in it. Shake it until it gets frosty on the outside. Before you start shaking,put icecubes in the glass and fill it up with water so the glass is cold when you have shaked the drink. Take the icecubes and water out of the glass,and fill the glass again vith icecubes and pour the drink in the glass.

instructions: Simply mix then add ice.
ingredientsWithAmount: 1 oz Triple sec or other Orange Liquer
name: Screaming Orgasm (San Francisco Style)

instructions: Add ingredents with ice and shake.
name: Screaming Nazi

instructions: Just mix it up.
name: Screaming Nazi #2

instructions: Build over ice. Granish with strawberries or cherries.
name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm

instructions: Build in a shot glass.
name: Screaming Blue Messiah

instructions: Pour all in shot glass, one by one. Set aflame, blow it out, and enjoy.....
name: Screaming Dead Nazi

instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a blender set on high speed for 15-30 seconds.
name: Screaming Epsilon

instructions: Shake well and pour over ice, top with cherry or chocolate sprinkles.
name: Screaming Chocolate Monkey

instructions: Fill glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all liquers and speed shake. Top with club soda.
name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm On The Beach

instructions: Combine liquors in a shaker of ice and shake. Strain into shot glasses. Partakers must scream "Valhalla!!" before doing the shot. Can also be served on the rocks in a large goblet for the brave warrior.

instructions: Best if built in a mixing glass with ice, shaken and poured into Hurricane glass, but can be built directly in the Hurricane glass.

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.
name: Screaming Banana Banshee

instructions: Shake or mix with a straw.
name: Screaming Banana

instructions: Pour a lot of kurant into ice filled glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake, always shake and add a splash of soda. Enjoy.
name: Scotty Boy

instructions: Pour first the scotch and then the cocoa over a lot of ice in a huge glass. The cocoa is going to melt 5-6 ice cubes, and it is always nice to have some left :)

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients except the Grenadine. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice if you like. Drop the Grenadine into the center and serve.

instructions: In a standard coffee mug put the scotch, honey and tea bag. Pour boiling hot water to fill mug. Steep for about one or two minutes. Then remove and dispose of tea bag.
name: Scotch Toddy

instructions: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 tsp dried and chopped Angelica root
name: Scottish Highland Liqueur

instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.
name: Scotch Sour

instructions: Pack a collins glass with crushed ice. Pour in scotch. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve with a straw.
name: Scotch Mist

instructions: Pour scotch in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
name: Scotch Highball

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.
name: Scotch Holiday Sour

instructions: Pour scotch and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lime peel/rind and serve.
name: Scotch Rickey

instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the scotch. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.
name: Silk Stockings

instructions: Combine over ice, strain into shot glass.

instructions: Chill both then mix together!! Can be served over ice or in smaller doses. Experiment, have fun, let us know what you come up with!

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

instructions: mix ingredients, stir, and add ice to bring level to top of glass
name: SigTau Scorpion

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Sidecar Cocktail

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Sidecar

instructions: Place cubes in glass, add gin, frozen lime juice, and 7-up then stir and enjoy.
ingredientsWithAmount: 1 tblsp frozen Lime juice concentrate (Minute Maid)

instructions: Shake all ingredients with lot's of ice.

instructions: Pour both ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass Take as a beer chaser when arriving late at the bar

instructions: mix equal parts into a tumber filled with cracked ice. Stir liberally and sip slowly.

instructions: Pour whiskey, gin, vermouth over ice and stir. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, add bitters and worcestershire sauce. Garnish with poppy seeds.

instructions: Fill glass with ice, then pour in all alcohol and milk and stir. If desired, garnish with whipped cream.

instructions: Mix ingredients, and pour over ice into highball glass
name: Siberian Dutchman

instructions: mix vodka and cinnamon schnapps in cocktail glass, add corbonated water, serve with ice
name: Si Kami Ki

instructions: Pour Jager at bottom of glass. Mix Crown, Everclear, & 151 separately to layer on top of the Jager. Splash the Grenadine. Attempt to shoot & SHUT THE HELL UP.
name: Shut the hell up

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

instructions: Begin with gentle fruit juices. Put a little less than 1 pint orange juice and the juice of 2 or 3 lemons into a half-gallon or gallon jar. Before squeezing the lemons, peel the rinds very thinly and add them as well. -- Add 2 quarts rum. Cover and let stand for three days. -- Put 2 pounds sugar into 1 quart water and bring to boil. Add the sugared water to the rum and fruit juice, cover, and let stand for two weeks. Then strain and bottle.
name: Shrub

instructions: Stir each ingredient in a mixing tin, then strain into a shot glass.

instructions: Mix brandy, milk and brown sugar on ice. Top with ginger ale

instructions: Add the tequila and 151 proof rum in a shot glass.Then pour in the tabasco.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-up.

instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

instructions: Pour shot of vodka into shot glass then top off with a generous portion of Tabasco.
name: Shot of Hell

instructions: Build over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
name: Shore Breeze

instructions: Pour all ingredients, except Coke, over ice. Fill with Coca-cola and stir.

instructions: Mix everything togeather in the glass and make sure that the ice is crushed. The best is if the ice is like "slush". You can also serve the drink with a slice of kiwi.

instructions: Blend Pear Liqueur, Milk and Ice Add 7-up to taste

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: mix together into a double shotglass
name: Snowball #3

instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

instructions: Take the glass and rub the edge on a lemon, then dip the rim in sugar. Drop the ice cubes into the glass, pour a 1/3 liqueur and fill it up with Sprite. Stir.

instructions: Place Sprite/7up into glass. Pour Heineken to top off. Mixture can be varied. Good summertime drink.

instructions: Larger Glass can be used if more cream or milk is needed to soften the impact of the drink.

instructions: Pour vidka in blender and add ice crem. Blend. Top with lemonade.

instructions: Used crushed ice. Can be made in anysizefrom punchbowl to personal serving.

instructions: Pour 2 1/2 oz. frangelico into a tall glass and fill with strong coffee. Top with a scoop of ice-cream.

instructions: Put Kahlua on the bottom over ice. Then add milk Then add Rye. Stir before drinking.

instructions: Mix the Snapple and whiskey in a pewter martini shaker. (preferably pewter because it keeps the drink so cold). Next step put crushed ice in very last so you do not water down the drink. Serve in a martini glass or a huricane glass with 4 lemon drops.
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 parts Jack Daniels sour mash whiskey

instructions: Pour all and mix well.

instructions: Mix all ingredients together with lots of ice.

instructions: Fill glass with ice, then add schnapps & 7-Up. Add Grenadine and let settle to the bottom of the glass. Carefully float the Blue Curacao over the top of the drink.

instructions: Fill a pint glass half way with cider, add a dash of blackcurrant cordial, top it up with lager, drink it down a bit (or pour it off) and add a shot of Jack Daniels.

instructions: Pour Chartreuse into shot glass, and dash the Tabasco in. More Tabasco for a more venomous bite!

instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

instructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want, you can add the blue curacao after stiring the drink.

instructions: Shake with lots of ice, strain into glass
name: Snake in the grass

instructions: Pour in the order given and enjoy
name: Stevie Wonder

instructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glasses.
name: Stevie Ray Vaughn

instructions: Mix all ingredience, strain into glass, and enjoy!
name: Steamboat

instructions: Mix everything together and add some crunched ice and olives!

instructions: Mix everything in a container (bottle, glass etc.), then it is ready for consumtion...

instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.
name: Snake Bite (UK)

instructions: Pour two ounces of Yukon Jack over ice; add a dash of lime juice; enjoy
name: Snakebite #1

instructions: Combine and Stir
name: Smurfs Up

instructions: Add 1 part Jack Daniels whiskey and 1 part tequila to your shot glass. Then add a few(5 to 10) drops of tabasco sauce. Take it down like a shot.
name: Snakebite #3

instructions: Pour the ingredients in a tall pint glass and let it swim.

instructions: Pour 1/2 pint Lager, and 1/2 pint Cider into a pint glass, then add Black Currant until drink is purple in color.

instructions: Fill shaker cup with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake and strain into shooter glass of preference.
name: Stardust

instructions: Get a large glass, (any glass but it must be large) Start from the top of the list and work your way down stirring each time you add an ingredient. When you've finished you need not do anything else just drink it.

instructions: Mix equal parts of all.
name: Star Wars

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

instructions: Take a warm beer mug with handle. Put in the liquor. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream dashing a little Orange liqueur on top. Serve with a straw.

instructions: Mix everything in the blender.
name: Star Burst

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Layer
name: Stained Blue Dress

instructions: Pick a highball glass and add som ice. Pour 2 cl of vodka. Add 1 cl of Rose's lime juice. Fill up with equal amounts of grape tonic and orange juice. Add a straw, stir and serve.

instructions: stir & strain in a cocktail glass
ingredientsWithAmount: 1/2 oz oz white Creme de Cacao

instructions: Just pour the glass 9/10's Coca-Cola, and add 1/10 Jolt Cola, and guzzle.

instructions: Chill the Rumple Minze until VERY cold. Then pour over the 151 in a shot glass. They will not layer, so don't try it. Then drink the shot quickly...don't waste time smelling the shot or sipping it...just drink it. The sit back and enjoy!

instructions: Stir.
name: Squirrel

instructions: Add above ingrediants in a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed. Enjoy!

instructions: Pour Midori then Advocaat in glass. Add a few dashes of grenadine and then float Bailey's on top.

instructions: Shake with ice (except for the grenadine). Pour grenadine on top.

instructions: Add ingredients in order. Pour the cream soda to make the whipped cream spurt.

instructions: Pour whiskey and cinnamon schnapps into shot glass. Add dash of tobasco.

instructions: Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)

instructions: In a normal glass, add everclear and then vodka. Nearly fill with orange juice, and then add blue curacao until the entire drink turns a nice shade of green.

instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

instructions: Mix ingredients in a large tub or cooler. (Sinks work well) Serve over ice.

name: Surputte

instructions: Take the highball, put in 3 to 4 ice cubes, add 1 cl of creme de cassis (not cooled), then 4 cl of preferably Absolut Vodka along with 2 cl of Gordon's Dry. instructions: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.
ingredientsWithAmount: 6 tblsp Fine ground whole, rich Coffee beans´

instructions: Funny how the program wouldn't let me post this without adding mixing instructions. There are so many ways to get hold of it. You can draw it, pour it, dig for it or simply dig it, you can get it from a well, a tap, a source, a fountain, a stream, you can drink it straight up, out of your hand, from a glass, a bottle, a jar and a container. Soft water may have the disadvantage of containing only minute quantities of magnesium, whereas hard water might be bad for your favourite sweat-shirt... But all in all, NO WATER - NO LIFE. So get a life, care for your water.
name: Water (the original)

instructions: Heat the water to boiling. Cut the lemons and oranges (and lime if using) in half and squeeze the juice into a separate bowl to save, throw the skins and pulp into the boiling water. Add spices and simmer for one hour. Remove the cinnamon sticks and a few cloves and allspice and save to one side. Using a slotted spoon or strainer remove the citrus peels and pulp and the remaining spices. Return the cinnamon sticks and saved spices to the water. Add the apple juice or cider and return to heat. When boiling remove from heat and add the citrus juice and sugar. Simmer very lightly for another 10 minutes and serve. Delicious!
name: Wassail #1

instructions: In a large cooking pot (at least twice the size needed to contain your soy milk), mix everything together and heat on high while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil (remember to stir constantly!), and the concoction will froth up. Remove from heat, let the froth subside, and repeat this cycle three more times. This is why your pot has to be bigger: the frothing would cause a major spill if you used a smaller pot. Serve and drink while hot. You can also adjust sweetness in your cup. Some people may want to strain this, as the ground spices sometimes have some coarse particles. This is a very nice hot drink, with a definite indian-food flavour, spicy-sweet and rich. The original recipe using milk also called for a tablespoon of butter for each serving (yuk!), and that was intended to make the drink rich-tasting. The thicker soy milk already has that thick rich texture, and is much lower in fat content.
ingredientsWithAmount: 1/2 L unflavored Soy milk (thicker is better)
name: Vegan - Hot indian "milk" drink

instructions: Fill the highball glass (or preferrably a 32oz glass) half way with crushed ice. Then add the shots of alcohol in this order: bacardi 151 rum, crown royal, and vanilla liqeur. Now pour one can of pepsi into the mixture. Finally, stir well with a barspoon, or any long spoon to evenly distribute the ingredients.

instructions: Combine sugars and water. Boil for 5 minutes. Gradually stir in coffee. Cool. Add vodka and vanilla and mix thoroughly. Cover and let ripen for 1 month. Remove vanilla bean.

instructions: Split vanilla beans first lengthwise, then in 1/2 inch pieces. Put in a bottle, add brandy and sugar, and shake *very* well until the sugar has dissolved. Now leave the mixture about 1 month so that the vanilla flavour has time to develop properly. After one month you can strain the liqueur so that the vanilla particles are removed. The vanilla liqueur keeps a very long time. To serve you have two possibilities: either use the liqueur as it comes out of the bottle, or mix with half'n'half or whipping cream. The latter doesn't keep too long though, it should be used in the next days (or right now). You can also pour a small amount of the liqueur in a glass of milk as a kind of alcoholic vanilla milk.
name: Vanilla Liqueur

instructions: Shake light rum, brandy, and cream with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float 151 proof rum on top and serve.

instructions: Mix the liquers, and put the other things it it :)

instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Top with a little whipped cream and sprinkle lightly with cocoa.

instructions: Cobine ingredients in a shaker 2/3 filled with ice. Shake well, and then strain into a cocktail glass.

instructions: mix everything except cola, sugar and ice in glass. then stir in sugar. then add ice cubes. finally, pour in cola. stir three times. drink.

instructions: Fill mixing glass with ice Pour in all ingredients Shake well Pour into salt rimmed glass Add lime wedge or wheel
name: Top Shelf Margarita

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

instructions: Because of the darkness of this particular shooter, layering is not necessary.
name: Tootsie Roll

instructions: Pour orange juice in first, then the peach schnaps. Then pour the shot of midori down the side of the glass, so that the midori forms a layer at the bottom of the glass.

instructions: Pour all over ice, mix and strain off ice..

instructions: Pour over ice.
name: Tootsie Roll #2

instructions: Add ice to glass, pour in Kahlua, fill with orange juice. Stir.
name: Tootsie

instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour into shot glasses. Slam it!!
name: Toolkit

instructions: Layer grenadine, amaretto, and lemon juice, then stir. Add 2 drops of chocolate syrup, let sink, and serve.
name: Tootsie Pop

instructions: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream and Brandy into glass. Add Heavy Cream. Stir well and serve.
name: Tongue Tangler

instructions: Mix. Shoot.
name: The Tony Kelly

instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

instructions: in a shaker half filled with ice, add first 5 ingredients. shake well. strain into hurricane glass filled with ice. lace with grenadine.
name: Toocan Sam

instructions: Stir in a mixing glass Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, tomato juice, and a little salt and pepper over ice cubes. Strain off into a large cocktail glass.

instructions: Just mix the ingredients.
name: Tom Collins ala Olsen

instructions: Pour all liquids except dark rum into glass. Fill with ice and stir. Float dark rum on top and stir gently.
name: Tom's Rum Runner

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

instructions: Beat egg whites stiff with electric beator, Add sugar gradually, add cinnamon, nutmeg and vanille, add in half of the eggs yolks blend until smooth. In Large mug fill with 1/2 batter 2 shots of 60% rum and 40% brandy (mixture) balance with boiling hot water. Stir well and sprinkle with nutmeg.

instructions: Mix equal parts in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

instructions: Mix the alcohol. Add 1 oz sugarsyrup, ice, 7 up and some pieces of lemon. Stir.

instructions: Pour the Jameson and Kahlua into a coffe mug, top off with hot fresh brewed coffee, finish with a tablespoon of fresh whipped cream.
name: Toby's Special

instructions: Blend ingrediants with ice until a creamy consistancy is reached (don't add too much ice, this will make the drink too thick). Pour into a *HONEY LINED GLASS*. Garnish with chocolate flakes and an open strawberry.

instructions: Blend with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes and optionally chocolate topping drizzled down the inside of the glass.

instructions: shake, strain into highball glass.

instructions: Beat egg whites to a stiff froth. Separately beat egg yolks until light in color, gradually add the powdered sugar and spices. Fold yolk mixture into whites. Divide mixture between four 8 oz. mugs. Add 1/2 shot brandy and 1 shot rum to each mug, fill with hot beverage. Stir well and top with nutmeg.

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

instructions: Layer in a shot glass with the tequila on the bottom, amaretto in the middle, and a splash of lime juice on top.
name: TLA

instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice stir and serve with a cherry
name: Toasted Fisherman

instructions: Pour in a big glass. Mix. It's best when it's cold and on the rocks.

instructions: pour ingredients into blender over crushed ice blend until you see the top of the mix stop moving pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lemon or lime slice... (by the way, this makes 1 to 2 servings only) hope ya enjoy it...

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass, and shake
name: Titia's Tushie

instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Takes a 2 oz shot glass. First put in the triple sec, then tequila, last the spiced rum.

instructions: Crush ice in a blender. Add frozen strawberries and banana to blender. Put on low speed and add Malibu & Banana liqueur. Pour into tall glass.

instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a big old fashion. Stir and serve.

instructions: Mix together in a a large glass and fill remainder with Orange Juice. Serve Cold

instructions: Fill glass halfway with Tang. Add Vodka until you can begin to taste the Vodka. Mix drink to taste.

instructions: Pour bottle of corona in a pint glass. Wait for it to settle. Then drop in shot of cuervo, and chug it down.

instructions: Fill a highball with ice, add the vodka, lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

instructions: Shake ingredients in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain ingredients into an old-fashioned glass of ice.

instructions: Layer in shot glass.
name: Tiger Tail

instructions: Shake with ice. Serve in ice-filled glass.

instructions: Pour a measure (depending on sweetness required 1/2 to 1 shot is average) of grenadine into a tall, cool glass. In a cocktail shaker, add ice, 2 shots of Jack, 1 shot of Triple Sec then top up with enough orange juice to fill the glass. Give it a good shake and pour slowly into the glass.

instructions: Mix as punch. Add orange or lemon slices, or olives.

instructions: Fill Mason jar with crushed ice. Add pineapple juice and Malibu rum. Mix well. Add splash of greanadine and 151 proof rum. Garnish with cherry, pineapple, or other fruit slice.

instructions: Add vodka, lemon juice, ice, and sugar in a mixing glass and shake. Pour into a cup and add orange soda. Stir.

instructions: Mix and stir and pour over ice
name: Tickle me Elmo

instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

instructions: Mix with ice in a hurricane glass.

instructions: Shake well with ice. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into sour glass.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Swill the Congac around the glass then add the cider and float the brandy over the top.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Shake it all chill and serve

instructions: Mix in shotglass(es). Add Curacao last, to a nice blue-green color.

instructions: Make tea add tequila, and shake.

instructions: Blend until smooth.

instructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

instructions: Pour over ice, shake until cooled, then pour into glass.

instructions: Nothing special, just mix.
ingredientsWithAmount: Mix in 8 oz Gatorade Mountain Ice

instructions: Mix ingredients in glass. Drink if you can.

instructions: 151 first, then Rumple Minze

instructions: Pour in your favorite shot glass and enjoy. Ahh... so smoothe!

instructions: Pour into collins glass. Garnish with Cherries.

instructions: Shake ingredients with ice strain into cocktail glass.
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 1/2 oz Casa Noble Gold tequila (or Crystal)

instructions: Stir tequila, vermouth, and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel, top with the olive, and serve.

instructions: Blend.

instructions: Combine all ingredients and poor over ice in a mason jar
name: Tennessee Tea

1 shot Bailey's irish cream to taste

instructions: Combine and serve with ice.

instructions: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.
name: Tequila Matador

instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Pour lemon juice into glass. Add ice cubes. Add salt. Pour tequila and stir to blend. Fill with Coke
name: Tequila Colagallo

instructions: Build in in the glass. Plenty of ice cubes
name: Taste of Winter

instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all liquers, top off with cream and shake well.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.

instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.
name: Tequila Pink

instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

instructions: Put ingredients in jar (make sure it's a quart one!), espresso first, then schnapps, finally Dr. Pepper. Swirl, smell, enjoy!

instructions: Pour Sprite over ice, add Tattoo and Stir
name: Tattooed Smurf

instructions: Stir over ice. Either strain in a cocktail glass or on the rocks in a highball glass. Serve with curl of lemon peel.

name: Tainted Heart

instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a shot glass.
name: T2

instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.
name: T.N.T. No. 2

instructions: Just pour off the amount into a shot glass Shoot and Enjoy!
name: T.K.O.

instructions: Layer in a shot glass.
name: T-52

instructions: Pour in Hot Damn, then add grape soda and then top off with cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry if you can avoid choking on it.

instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add liquor, juice, and then Sprite.
name: Tahitian Treat

instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

instructions: Combine wine, lemon rind, and juice. Stir in 1 cup of the sugar and let stand until sugar dissolves. Combine milk and cream, add wine mixture, and beat with a rotary beater until frothy. Beat egg whites until stiff, add remaining 1/2 cup sugar, a little at a time, beating constantly until whites stand in peaks. Pour wine mixture into punch bowl, top with puffs of egg white, and sprinkle whites with nutmeg.

instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve. (An olive may be substituted for the cherry, if preferred.)

instructions: Just fuckin' mix it

instructions: Fill glass half way with vodka, fill rest of way with Zima. Then add the lime juice (Rose's Lime Juice works best). Now stir and add the slice of lime.

instructions: Add Godiva and the Bailey's in a blender. Add ice to desired thickness. Blend well.

instructions: Mix the ingredients with a mixer.

instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

instructions: Pour Tia Maria and Galliano over ice, and fill to taste with Coca Cola
name: Sweet Treat

instructions: Pour cream soda last: this gives a foam similar to that on an ice cream float.

instructions: Add all into Shot glass. Slam the shot glass down as to mix up the ingrediants and give it a fizz. Then just drink it down and enjoy.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: mix all ingrediants together in container. poor into shot glass.

instructions: Layer the vodka and cherry liquer then put whip cream on top and a cherry on that when taking the shot engulf the whole thing and after you swallow pull the stem of the cherry out.

instructions: Fill highball glass with ice and combine ingredients, stir and enjoy.

instructions: Add all the ingredients into a shaker over ice. Shake gently and strain into shot glass.

Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

instructions: Simply pour them together.

instructions: Fill a tall glass or cup with ice cubes, about 1/3 of the way full. Add the shots of tequila, adding more or less depending on the size of the cup. Then fill up most of the cup with raspberry lemonade, and add the frozen orange juice concentrate. Mix it well with a spoon until everything is well blended.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 bottles Red wine (Gallo L C red rose)

instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Sweet Maria

instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. old-fashioned glass and serve.

instructions: Fill half of the glass with ice and stir.

instructions: Ice first, then the Gin (use high quality like Beefeeter). Then pour on the lime juice (use a sweet brand like Hearts) and the fill upp the class with ginger ale.

instructions: Pour into glass and fill with tonic wafer. Garnish with an orange slice or peel.

instructions: Fill a Higball glass 2/3 with ice cubes. build the alcoholic and the sprite into the glass. The sour mix on top as a fizz.(shaken/mixed). Served with straw and a slice of citrus on top.

instructions: Chunk up the two bananas and put them in the bottom of a blender. Place the two large wedges of pineapple, strawberries and ice on top. Add rum if desired. Puree until smooth (a little water or fruit juice might be required). Pour into glass and serve immediately.

instructions: Mix all the ingredients besides the ice in a large pitcher (or several smaller). Once thoroughly mixed, add the ice and serve in wine glasses.
ingredientsWithAmount: 1 L Fruit juice (preferrably a Sangria fruit juice mix)

instructions: Just fill a big glass with all the ingridients
name: Super Qell

instructions: Pour in the Everclear. Add the Sunny D and then the tropical fruit schnapps. Best if served chilled.
name: Super Bloody Screwdriver

instructions: Mix equal parts over ice, shake, strain, and serve...SPF 30!
name: Suntan Lotion

instructions: Mix whiskey and sour mix and pour over ice-filled whiskeysour glass. Slowly add grenadine which will sink to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with orange slices and cherries.
name: Sunset Sour

instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon twist.
name: Sunsplash

instructions: Shake Vodka and Orange Juice. Top glass with Champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.
name: Sunshine Smile

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.
name: Sunshine Cocktail

instructions: Begin by pouring in the fruit punch. Then add the gin. Next, pour the orange juice in followed by the Sprite.
name: Super Allez

instructions: Mix liqueur, vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Add some ice and fill the glass with ginger ale (or Sprite if you don't have ginger ale). Decorate with a slice of orange.
ingredientsWithAmount: Fill with Ginger ale or Sprite
name: Sunrise

instructions: Splash of Grenadine to flavor, chill/strain shot or can be a drink over ice.
name: Sunset (Night Club)

instructions: Combine in a shaker over a few ice cubes. Shake thoroughly. Pour into a collins glass and serve.
name: Sunset Island

instructions: Combine the vodka and rum in a shot glass. Add the chartreuse to make the drink a gasoline-type color.
name: Sunoco 251

instructions: Simple! Fill half the shot with (white) tequila and top it up with Galliano
name: Sunny Mexico

instructions: First off, mix the orange juice with the malibu in a seperate glass, pour the firewater in the martini glass, the orange mix over it and when it's settled, pour the vodka slowly over the mixture. If you want you can stir now (in that case the above directions are void) - but i prefer not to. Now's the time for the red wine. It doesn't have to be anything special: I tend to use a Lambrusco because of the pearliness, also the amount of wine you use will affect the taste of the drink immensely. I use between 1/2 cl to 1 cl, not more, other wise the tatse of the wine will dominate too much. To get your optimal taste you'll just have to experiment a little back and forth.
name: Sunny Sex

instructions: Pour the bacardi then the 7-up, sour mix and finally the russchian on top. Use a lot of ice.
name: Sunding Over the top

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.
ingredientsWithAmount: 28 oz Club soda (or mineral water), chilled
6 oz frozen Orange juice concentrate, thawed
name: Sunny Holiday Punch

instructions: Pour together and serve cold.
name: Sunny D Screwdriver

instructions: Mix in blender until smooth. Garnish with slice of orange.
name: Sun Shake

instructions: Pour eveything in a big punch bowl or cooler with a big block of ice. Throw in some cherries and a half bottle of 151 for good measure. Have a good time!
name: Sunburn

instructions: Just mix the ingredients. It can also be served without alchohol. Just mix equal amounts of sprite light and orange juice.
name: Summertime

instructions: Stir.
name: Summit County Suicide

instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a tall glass over ice.
name: Sun Of A Beach

instructions: Make the tea and add all the stuff. Mix and enjoy.
name: Summer Tea

instructions: Put ice cubes in the Collins glass. Then poor the white rum. Fill with the fruit punch and the ginger ale.
name: Summer Sunset

instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add gin and triple sec, and fill with pineapple juice. Add a splash of grenadine on top.
name: Summer Sky

instructions: Make sure all ingredients are cold! Serve shaken, straight up with a twist.
name: Summer Martini

instructions: Cut a small, circular hole in the watermelon. Save the piece cut out. Turn the watermelon with the hole facing the ground so any juices drip out. Mix the vodka, grenadine and 7-Up in a seperate bowl. Slowly pour the mix into the watermelon (use a funnel if you have one). If you put the liquid too fast into the watermelon, it wont absorb properly. Pop the piece you cut out back into the hole. Shake the melon. Throw it in the fridge for an afternoon. When the family is over, cut slices out of the watermelon and enjoy.
name: Summer Sucker

instructions: First, fill the champagne flute with heaps of ice. Next, pour in your Schnapps and Midori. Now fill the flute to the top with Champagne. Let the drink settle for a minute (especially if you've been pouring behind a busy, bumpy nightclub!). Use a long bar straw to drink the shot from the bottom up (push the straw right to the bottom of the flute before starting), all at once! Very Important - Don't stop in the middle of the drink!
name: Summer Mind Eraser

instructions: Mix together in shaker, pour into glass over ice. Lime juice can be added to taste. Makes 2 drinks.
name: Summer Splash

instructions: Layer Blue Curacao and Bailey's in a shot glass over crushed ice. Mix to drink.
name: Summer Fling

instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice in shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass Garnish with lemon and pinapple pieces
ingredientsWithAmount: 45 ml Lemon juice or lemon sqaush
name: Summer Dreams

instructions: Put a block of ice in a punch bowl. Pour in wine and creme de cassis, and stir. Float orange slices and strawberries on top. Serve in 4-ounce punch glasses.
name: Summer Punch

instructions: Pour in order.
name: Suitor

instructions: Float Tabasco a top of rum.
name: Suicide The Shot

instructions: Line three 1 1/2 oz shot glasses up on the bar. pour each of the liquors into its own glass. Splash the orange juice into the vodka for color. Then shoot (RED YELLOW GREEN)
name: Suicide Stop Light

instructions: Just mix all ingredients together.
name: Suicide #2

instructions: Shake well with lots of ice. Then fill a large (35cl) glass with ice cubes. Strain into glass.
name: Suicide #1

instructions: Shake and strain cranberry vodka into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add a splash of lemon juice and cranberry juice. For decoration, insert a stirrer through a slice of lemon to bridge over the glass.
name: Sugared Rose

instructions: Add all of the liquors first in no particular order, then mix the sugar in until it's all dissolved then fill with 7-up.
name: Sugar High

instructions: Add ice, shake well. serve with cherry, lemon (dipped in sugar), and straw.
name: Sugar Kick

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Sugar Daddy

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Suffragette City

instructions: Let the hot chocolate cool to room temperature. In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and hot chocolate. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cream into the center of the drink.
name: Sue Riding High

instructions: Pour Iced Tea in glass first, then top with the Sweet and Sour, and then add Triple Sec to taste. Stir once and serve.
name: Suddenly Daylight

instructions: Shake and strain. Add a few drops of grenadine. Garnish with a slice of lime, a maraschino cherry and fresh mint.
name: Sud-Ouest

instructions: Pour ingredients into a glass. Stir. Drink.
name: Suffering Bastard

instructions: Mix the Vodka, Tequila, Aftershock, Beer, and Lemonade in a blender. Blend until a smooth frothy substance is achieved. Fill beer mug with drink and prepared to be hit with a Suburban Warhead
name: Suburban Warhead

instructions: Start with the gin, then fill up the glas with tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.
name: Submarine (nuclear)

instructions: Put crushed ice in glass about a quarter of the way up. Pour in vodka, peach schnapps and the three juices (apple, orange, and cranberry.) Stir through a couple of times.
name: Sucker punch

instructions: Fill a Shot with the Tequila and put the shot upside down inside the Beer Mug (make sure the Tequila stays inside the shot). Fill the Beer Mug with Beer. If you like salt on the edge of the Beer Mug you can add it. Also lemon can be added depending on you.
name: Submarine (Mexican)

instructions: Pour one shot Sambuca, add a splash of Galliano on top. Light on fire and drink it.
name: Stubborn Italian

instructions: Start with the gin, then fill up with the tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.
name: Submarine (conventional)

instructions: Add each ingredient over ice and stir. Garnish with a Hersheys Kiss attached to a toothpick, with a butterscotch lifesaver on top.
name: Stubbly Beaver

instructions: Mix all three in a shooter! Slight burn on the way down is normal, just enjoy it.
name: StumbleFuck

instructions: In a LARGE pitcher, pour in 3 cans of beer, then the vodka and lemonade, then the last 3 beers. Mix gently and pour into a tall glass over ice. It sounds horrible, but the beer taste is hidden. It tastes like lemonade!
name: Strip and Go Naked

instructions: Simple Enough. Mix the Irish Cream and the Strawberry Liqueur in a shot glass, stirring or shaking it.
name: Strawgasm

instructions: Pour Zima in any glass in which it fits, add strawberry syrup and stir.
name: Strawberry Zima

instructions: Shake all ingredience together except cream. Float cream on top. Garnish with pineapple spear and cherry.
name: Strawberry Storm

instructions: Add ice and shots in a hurricane or other tall glass. Add 1/2 of the sprite. Shake Well Add rest of sprite. Finished ingredient should look similar to pink lemonade. Enjoy!
name: Strawberry Surprise

instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps and lemonade. Shake or stir. Garnish with a sugared strawberry if desired.
name: Strawberry Starburst

instructions: Fill glass half full of ice. Add Schnapps and Juice. Add the Cream and stir.
name: Strawberry Stripper

instructions: Add Khaluha to a glass then the milk and finally add the syrup and stir with a spoon.
name: Strawberry Sombrero

instructions: Sprinkle sugar over diced strawberries, and toss by hand in a bowl. Pour Alize over strawberries, and let soak for 15 min. to a half an hour. Strain mixture well, and store in Alize bottle for later use. Will yeild more than a bottle, so have another empty bottle ready in reserve.
name: Strawberry Soak

instructions: Put all in blender and wizz away until thick.
name: Strawberry Smoothie

instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.
name: Strawberry Shivers

instructions: Put the sherbet in a bowl and pour the 7-up over the sherbet. Stir until the sherbet is melted. This makes a pretty pink punch. You can use diet soda for a punch that is less sweet.
name: Strawberry Punch #2

instructions: Blend all but the whipped cream until frosty. Pour in beer mug. Top with whipped cream. Enjoy.
name: Strawberry Shortcake

instructions: Allow strawberries to thaw for a couple of hours in fridge. Prepare lemonade and chill. Combine all just before serving and mix until sherbet is dissolved. Place ice ring in to keep punch cold.
name: Strawberry Punch #1

instructions: Mix the contents so that the color of the drink is a pink color. Serve and enjoy
name: Strawberry Quick

instructions: Muddle strawberries, mint, lime and Creme de Fraise des Boise hard in a shaker tin. Add Havana Club 3-year Old rum and fill shaker with ice. Shake well. Double strain (through sieve) into Collins Glass filled with cracked ice. Top with a splash of soda water and garnish with spring of mint.
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 cl Creme de Fraise des Bois (Cartron)
name: Strawberry Mojito

instructions: Rub rim of chilled martini glass with a cut strawberry. Dip rim into a bowl of sugar until evenly coated. Pour Gin/Vodka, vermouth, and grenadine into a mixing glass with plenty of ice, and stir briskly. Strain into martini glass and drop in a strawberry.

instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

instructions: Throw everything into a blender and mix until fairly smooth. Serve over ice.

instructions: Mix strawberries and sugar in a bowl and let stand for 5-10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Divide into two white wine glasses, add champagne and creme de cassis.
name: Strawberry Kir Royale

instructions: Add all ingredients (except ice) in the order shown. Stir well. Add ice cubes and serve.
name: Strawberry Kiss

instructions: Blend strawberries into 4 oz puree, add 2 oz of rum (and some sugar if you want to) and blend for a couple of second. Pour into sugar rimmed glass. Mix the orange juice and 1 oz of rum, and gently layer on top in glass.

instructions: Shake vodka and amaretto. Fill with 7-Up.
name: Strawberry Dream #2

instructions: Pour brandy and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

instructions: Blend all ingredients (except mint sprig) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass, add the sprig of mint, and serve.
name: Strawberry Dawn

instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and slam. Enjoy!
name: Strawberry Bomb

instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until drink is smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.
name: Strawberry Dream

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Strawberry Daiquiri

instructions: Sprinkle strawbs with sugar, add one bottle cider. Chill for several hours. To serve, pour into large bowl with ice, add the rest of the wine. Serve in small wine glasses.
name: Strawberry Bolle

instructions: Stir gently with a swizzle stick before serving.
name: Strawberry Blonde

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Shake well. Garnish with a flag (orange and cherry).

instructions: Layer in the order given: Irish Cream, Creme de Cacao, Strawberry Liqueur.
name: Strawberry Blond

instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, Calvados, and cherry brandy. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

instructions: Build in shot glass. Float Bailey's in amaretto and top with 151. The Bailey's should float in the middle.

instructions: Place schnapps, half-and-half, sugar, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a high speed. Add 2 of the strawberries and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a parfait glass, top with the other strawberry, and serve with a straw.

instructions: Add Aftershock then Passoa. Fill with orange juice and ice to taste.

instructions: Add whiskyand vodka to glass of ice. Stir in maple syrup. Wait 2 minutes and enjoy.
name: STP (the motor oil of course)

instructions: Mix ingrediants together.
name: Storm Trooper

instructions: Shake Malibu Rum and Alizé on ice. Strain into glass. Stir in Jägermeister.
name: Stoner On Acid

instructions: Line up three shot glasses. Pour 1 shot of vodka into each glass. Add a splash of midori to one, a splash of orange juice to another and a splash of cranberry juice to the third. Drink them down Red, Yellow, Green. It's a stop light!

instructions: Fill higeball glass with ice. Pour in Jägermeister and pear liqueur. Top with lemon mix and "Battery" energy drink. Garnish with a lemon slice.
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 cl Pear liqueur (Xanté Poire au Cognac)
name: Stoned

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.
name: Stone Sour

instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Stone Cocktail

instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add whiskey and bitters and fill with apple cider. Both Bourbon and Scotch can be used.

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the vodka, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a cocktail glass. Top with Champagne and garnish with an organce twist.

instructions: Ice first, next is the liquor and then the pop.
name: Stock Market Crash

instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Stinger

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.
name: Stirrup Cup

instructions: Build in a pint glass (preferably), shake and serve with a lemon wedge. Or you can mix in tin and serve over ice.

instructions: Pour all ingredients together in ice filled glass. Shake and pour back into glass.
name: Stoli Fruit Cocktail

instructions: Tabasco in the bottom of the shot. Pour Vodka and Crème de Mènthe gently on top. Shoot!
name: Stinger Shot

instructions: Put Tequila into shot glass. Add 151 rum and Lemon Juice. Add sugar and stir slightly.

instructions: Shake with ice, strain, serve in cocktail glass
name: Stinger #2

instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve. (Bourbon may be substituted for blended whiskey, if preferred.)

instructions: Take a 12oz bottle of beer and drink the neck of the bottle. Pour 1 or more shots of Jägermeister into the neck. Swish it around a little bit and presto, instant drunk.

instructions: Add 1/2 oz dry vermouth in a chilled cocktail glass, and roll the vermouth around the glass and throw away the excess. In a mixing glass with ice, pour crown royal, amaretto, and orange bitters and stir. Strain into cocktail glass, and garnish with orange peel and maraschino cherry.

instructions: Add ice, then whisky, fill with soda. Stir and enjoy.

instructions: Mix gentle, and add ice cubes. Serve whith Straw.

instructions: Poor ingredients over lots of ice.Garnish with slice of lime.
name: Springtime

instructions: Layer the Amarula gently onto the Creme de menthe and then add a thin layer of cream.

instructions: First, add one part of Johnnie Walker Red. Next add one part Johnnie Walker Black, followed by another part of Absolut Citron. Finally, throw in a touch of amaretto, for flavor.

instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing tin, shake like a wild man, and strain into a martini glass.

instructions: Stir together with ice.
name: Spooky Juice

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Spring Feeling Cocktail

instructions: Start with glass of soda then add other ingredients and stir.
name: Splurge

instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large glass with lots of ice and enjoy.
name: Split Beaver

instructions: Add all ingredients in blender, blend till slushy, add sugar to taste.
name: Splender Blenders

instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice and stir.

instructions: Stir the Amaretto with the Dr. Pepper. Pour over Ice cubes and add two Cherries. Enjoy.

instructions: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.
name: Spiking coffee

instructions: Shake gin and cherry juce. Fill with 7-up and ice.
name: Spiked Cherry

instructions: Shake the Gin and Vermouth with ice in a shaker. Pour into a large Martini glass. Pour the tabasco into the finished drink. Stir very lightly.

instructions: put alchohol in shot glass, drop strawberry into glass, then try and make cream float on top.

instructions: Pour in all ingredients then mix completely so that the drink turns a red color. Add more Grenadine for a sweeter, thicker taste.

instructions: Mix Hot Damn and Butterscotch Schnapps in shot glass first, then carefully add the irish cream without mixing.

instructions: Add equal parts of liqeuer to hot chocolate or cocoa and top with whipped cream and shave chocolate, cinnamon or nutmeg.

instructions: Put the Spiced Rum in the glass. Fill with cherry coke. Stir.

instructions: Combine peach nectar, orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.

instructions: Over ice pour Southern Comfort, Peach Schnapps and Malibu Rum. Top off with Pineapple Juice. Shake and pour into glass.

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

instructions: Boil one cup water. Add the package of cherry jello. Stir for 2 minutes. Then pour in the cup of spiced rum. Stir until mixed. Pour into a pan and refrigerate.
name: Spiced Cherry Jello

instructions: Mix with ice, strain, and serve in shot glass.
name: Spice Cake

instructions: Mix all three on the rocks.
name: Spice and Ice

instructions: Fill the slammer glass with tequila and vodka and drop carefully some cream in it.
name: Sperm

instructions: Shake brandy, gin, orange juice, and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel, top with the cherry, and serve.
name: Spencer Cocktail

instructions: Pour Bailey's and Amaretto into a shot glass, swish, and throw it back.

instructions: just pour the alcoholic ingridents in a shot glas and when you done that squeze a little amount of lime juice on top

instructions: In a shaker, combine tequila and Cointreau with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

instructions: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.
name: Special K

instructions: Mix 'em, garnish with a slice of lime (optional).
name: Spearmint Lifesaver

instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Special Rough Cocktail

instructions: Pour Bacardi 151 in the shot glass first, then pour Rumplminze on top, do not mix.
name: Sparkplug

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
name: Spark In The Night

instructions: Pour in glass and stir. Serve cold.
name: Spanish Fly

instructions: Pour Licor 43 and coffee into a irish coffee cup. Float whipped cream and sprinkle a little cinnamon on top.
name: Spanish Coffee

instructions: Simply add in order vodka, ice, orange juice, lemon, and vinegar. Ice can be crushed.
name: Spear Chugger

instructions: Mix congac, kaluha, and espresso in a parfait glass and stir gently. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

instructions: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

name: Spanish chocolate

instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.
ingredientsWithAmount: 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum or Myer's Rum

instructions: Mix all ingredients, except lemon peel, with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and drop into glass.

instructions: Pour the juices first, then top off with the liqueur.

instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into Cocktail glasses.
name: Southern Sunrise

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Soviet

instructions: Just mix it! Have a slice of lime on the top. Served with lots of ice...
name: Southern Special

instructions: Shake well with ice, strain over ice in a medium sized hurricaneglass.
name: Soylent Green

instructions: Pour vodka, triple sec and lime juice over ice. Fill to top with club soda. Stir.
name: Soviet Sunset

instructions: Mix ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass, or serve on the rocks into an ordinary glass. Garnish with a flag (confederate).
name: Southern Sparkler

instructions: Mix ingredients on the rocks.
name: Southern Suicide

instructions: Fill jigger with ice. add all ingredients. Cover, shake and pour into shot glasses.
name: Southern Smile

instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into shot glass, then put in the Peach Schnapps. Bottoms up!
name: Southern Pride

instructions: Fill highball half full with ice. Add coconut rum. Fill with eggnog. Stir in grenadine to desired red (no more than 1 oz).
name: Southern Santa

instructions: Add 2 oz. of Sothern Comfort and 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps to a highball glass. Next add ice and top off with lemonade.
name: Southern Salutation

instructions: Pour liquors, fill with sour mix and shake. Then top with 7-UP or Sprite and garnish with a cherry.
name: Southern Raspberry Tart

instructions: add all with ice shack and strain
name: Southern Peach

instructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass. Consume Repeatedly
name: Southern Joe

instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
name: Southern Gin Cocktail

instructions: Add first the Southern Comfort. Then add the Triple Sec. Finish the shot with some Grenadine. Tip your head back and enjoy this smoothest shot in the south.
name: Southern Fruity Passion

instructions: basically put ice in glass, add 1 oz. southern comfort, then fill glass with mountain dew and enjoy!

instructions: Can be made 'up' or 'on the rocks' Prepare sour glass. Add Southern Comfort and sour mix to mixing glass. Shake well (8-10 times) and strain into glass providing lots of foam. Add flag or butterfly (orange and cherry on a pick) as garnish.
name: Southern Comfort Sour

instructions: Add all ingredients into a sauce pan. Warm mixture on stove, until all flavors have steeped together (about 5 min.). Do not let it boil! Remove cinnamon sticks. Serve while still hot.
name: Southern Hospitality

instructions: Put ice in a highball glass and the add the liquors. Top the glass off with Coke and 7-up and a lemon twist. Stir.
name: Southern Death Cult

instructions: Shake and strain over ice
name: Southern Comfort Kamikaze

instructions: Mix Together and Drink
name: Southern Chase

instructions: No mixing required.
name: Southern Bubbles

instructions: Fill an Old Fashioned Glass half full with ice cubes. Next pour the Southern comfort in, than add the schnapps, being carefull not to mix the drinks too much.
name: Southern Dream

instructions: Mix together and shoot or double amount and serve over ice.
name: Southern Ireland

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
name: Southern Bride

instructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
name: Southern Blues

instructions: Pour the brandy into a pousse cafe glass. Tilt the glass to a 45-degree angle and slowly pour the creme de cacao down the side of the glass so that it floats on the brandy. Repeat this precedure with the Benedictine.
name: Southern Belle

instructions: Pour ingredients into mixing/cheater tin over ice, shake and pour.

instructions: In shot glass, pour 1/3 Southern Comfort and 1/3 Jim Beam. Add 1/3 Tia Maria and let set and form. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine (or as sweet as desired).

instructions: Just pour it all in a glass. Stir it if you really feel the need to. I usually just pour in the alcohol and let the fruit juice do the mixing for me. For the best results, try and use that Minute Maid Fruit Punch. That stuff works very well. I advise against using any sort of "all-citrus" fruit juice, even OJ.
name: Southern Blast

instructions: Add all ingredients to blender including one mint leaf as it will be blended up and leave little specks at top of drink. After drink is complete add other whole mint leaves. A lime wedge can also be added. Amount of soda water should fluxuate according to how strong the lemon-lime solution is.
ingredientsWithAmount: 2 oz Lime juice or lemon-lime juice
name: South Side

instructions: Serve in rocks glass - no ice - Pour both liquors, fill with club soda, roll once Serve with straw
name: Southampton Slam

instructions: Pour tonic water over ice in a highball glass. Add a squeeze of lime and Angostura bitters. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wheel.
name: Southampton

instructions: Fill the glass with ice and pour in Southern Comfort. fill with Abita root beer.
name: Southern Bell

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.
name: South Of The Border

instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order listed above. Allow Cranberry to float. Do not stir this drink. Garnish with lime wedge.
name: South Padre Island

A Southern Bank is a South Bank which has been added 1 part Southern Comfort.

instructions: Boil water, sugars, beer and the yellow part of the lemon's peel. Let the mixture cool down. Peel the white part of the lemon's peel carefully and cut the fruit part of the lemon in small pieces and add to sima. Disolve the yeast in a bit of sima and add to sima. Put 5-6 raisins and 1 tablespoon sugar in every bottle. Put sima in bottles and close the bottles carefully. Leave sima in a cold place for a couple of days. Sima is ready when the raisins float. Sima will keep in cold place for 1-2 weeks.

instructions: Fill glass with ice, insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka, Midori, Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom, yellow in the middle and red on top.
name: Sex on the Brain

instructions: Half fill with cranberry juice and grapefruit juice, stir in highball glass.
name: Sex on the Beach

instructions: Use a shaker: first put in the ice, then add the orange juice ( you should always add the fruit juices before the alcohol! ). Put both the Passoa and the Malibu in and give it a good shake. Poor in a glass and add a cube of ice. The poor a bit of cream on top of the ice cubes ( preferably using a teaspoon or so to keep the cream from mixing with the other stuff ). Put a cherry on top and voila, there's your Sex on the Beach.
name: Sex on the Beach #9

instructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients and kiwi in blender, then add the food coloring and stir. Pour into glass and top with cherry.
name: Sex under the bleachers with a KU cheerleader

instructions: Add rum, grenadine, and sugar syrup in glass. Fill with orange juice. Add ice and shake, strain into glass and garnish with marachino cherry.
name: Shitface

instructions: Add all together and stir heavily. You will then serve cold.
name: Sex on the Beach #7

instructions: This can be on the rocks or up... but best on the rocks! Start with the Midori since it is heaviest, then the Chambord and the Absolut. Fill the glass 2/3 full with Cranberry juice, and then a splash of grapefruit for color. It should be an orangish-red color. Garnish with several cherries.
name: Sex on the Beach #4

instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher of ice to chill, adding just enough grenadine to color pink. Add more or less OJ and 7-up to achieve desired strength. Strain into bottle to serve as shooters or serve the whole pitcher with a number of straws for a group to slurp down at the same time!!
name: Sex on the Beach #3

instructions: For the shooter you mix all ingredients together over ice. For the shot you decrease the Pineapple Juice to 1 ct. Chill and then strain.
name: Sex on the Beach #2

instructions: Mix all ingredients in order in ordinary glass. Add cranberry and orange juice to your liking.
name: Sex on the Beach #12

instructions: Shake all except orange juice with ice. Pour into a hiball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice.
name: Sex on the Grass

instructions: No mixing, just pour in in any order.
name: Sex on the Beach #11

instructions: Mix in tall glass with ice.
name: Sex on my face

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice and blend until the drink has reached the desired consistency. Pour unstrained into cocktail glass and garnish with whiped cream and a cherry.
name: Sex on Ice

instructions: Coco-Rum can be substituted for Malibu Rum.
name: Sex on the Beach #8

instructions: Blend ingredients by shaking well.
name: Sex on Daytona Beach

instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter.

instructions: Shake and Strain into Champagne Flute.
name: Sex in the Shower

instructions: Mix ingredients and add some ice.

instructions: Makes 1 gallon of punch -- mix all 4 liquers in 1 parts and fill rest with pineapple and cranberry juice
name: Sex On The Beach - Jersey Style

instructions: shake like hell whith some ice
name: Sex on the Beach #10

instructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a Highball glass. Stir until mixture is pink. Add a bit of cranberry juice if you want to make it Bettsy Style.

instructions: Mix two rums, melon, peach and blue curacao in a mixing tin with the sour mix. Pour into a collins glass with ice and add a dash of lemonade. Garnish with lemon squeeze.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Shake and strain.

instructions: Highball glass 1/2 full ice. Add vodka and schapps. Fill to near top with OJ, amount depends on ice and glass size. Add cream last and stir. May be served up after mixing. The amount of OJ and dairy cream may be adjusted taste.

instructions: Fill a Collins glass most of the way with ice. Pour in the Yukon Jack. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprig) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, brandy, vermouth, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

instructions: Put a few cubes of ice inside glass. Pour shot of Seagram 7 into the glass, then Pour 7-UP into glass. Shake or stir briskly.

instructions: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

instructions: First of all put in the mixing glass absolut vodka then strawberry vodka, dry vermouth, pineapple juice, blue curacao and lemon juice. Now shake with ice and fill up the glass.

instructions: Mix liquor, juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into ice filled highball glass.

instructions: First pour Goldschlager into a shot glass, then add grenadine.

instructions: Shake well and serve on the rocks.

instructions: Put vodka and sloe gin into glass. Add lemonade.

instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

instructions: Ingredients can be mixed in any order over ice.

instructions: Red wine first, then the cider.
name: Seaside-Summerbliss

instructions: Pour vodka over ice into highball glass. Add mixers. May be garnished with a wedge of lime.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

instructions: Shake and serve on the rocks.

instructions: Serve in a tall glass

instructions: Chill an Old Fashioned glass by filling with crushed ice. In another glass mix the sugar with the bitters dissolving the sugar. Add some ice, stirring to chill. In the Old Fashioned glass remove the ice and pour in the absinthe coating the entire glass. Remove the excess absinthe. Add the Rye Whiskey and bitters/sugar mixture. Add the Lemon Twist.

instructions: Mix over ice in shaker and strain.

instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

instructions: Mix the cognac and curacao several hours ahead of time. When ready to serve, pour the necessary amount of this mixture over a block of ice or ice mold in a *cold* punch bowl, and add *thoroughly chilled* champagne. Stir and serve at once, WITHOUT LADLING BACK AND FORTH OVER THE ICE, as this will eliminate the bubbles.

instructions: Pour the Scotch and the water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

instructions: Put orange rind in a half-pint jar with 1/4 cup vodka. Seal it and shake occasionally. Let it steep overnight. -- Pour sugar and 1 2/3 cups vodka into a 28 ounce bottle. Seal it and shake until all the sugar is dissolved, then add the maple syrup. -- Filter the orange extract through a fine handkerchief or coffee filter until it becomes clear. -- Add a tablespoon of the final extract to the vodka syrup mixture and mix well. If your orange peels are much more or less aromatic than average, adjust the quantity so that you have enough to hide the maple flavor, without having enough to make the liqueur bitter or recognizably orange flavored.
name: Saurian Brandy

instructions: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth, use a sugar frosted rim.

instructions: Combine and drink

The intent is to make layers with the liquors (so that it looks like an iceberg.) Stick a straw in the middle of the drink and drink the whole drink at once through the straw.

instructions: First make tea in the water. Then add all the other stuff. Simmer at least 1/2 hour. Makes a nice smell in the kitchen at Christmas parties.
